Review_Header: We installed this Rockport fan yesterday. My husband (who is 72) has installed many fans over the...
Review_Text: We installed this Rockport fan yesterday. My husband (who is 72) has installed many fans over the years and this was by far the easiest. The instructions could be more detailed, particularly for someone with less experience. But the fan is designed to make the installation as simple as possible. We installed the light kit, but elected to not use it. We preferred the clean look of the fan without it and didn't need the lights. We love this fan. It is quiet, balanced and looks great! For us it was the perfect choice.

Review_Header: I really love the look of the fan-the blade and fan finishes are very pretty and sleek. The light...
Review_Text: I really love the look of the fan-the blade and fan finishes are very pretty and sleek. The lights are nice and bright! Please be advised that the fan and remote come in separate boxes with separate instructions. The remote comes as a "universal" remote and the instructions are not very clear with how to connect the remote with the fan and the house wires. Luckily we had purchased a different Hampton Bay fan with remote for another room so we were able to follow the wires and instructions from that model and copy them for this particular fan. Overall the function of the fan/remote are easy to use and the fan is very quiet and powerful.

Product_Name: Hugger 52 in. LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit
Review_Header: This fan offers the two most important qualities of a ceiling fan. It was not expensive and it ru...
Review_Text: This fan offers the two most important qualities of a ceiling fan. It was not expensive and it runs quietly. When set at the two lower speeds we cannot even hear the fan motor and on high speed there is only a slight motor noise. Air flow is excellent and the appearance is is clean and attractive. I also like that it uses a standard LED light bulb and not an integrated LED. This allows you to just replace the light bulb should something go wrong or you want to update to a smart bulb. They even included an extra screw for each type used on the fan.There are a lot of screws but they all fit and things aligned nicely. It took about 45 minutes to complete the installation. The only negative thing I noticed was that the included chain pulls are made of plastic and not metal.

Product_Name: Hugger 52 in. LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit
Review_Header: Hugger 52" ceiling fan from Home Depot (Model AL383LED-BN (made in China). Bought 2 of these for ...
Review_Text: Hugger 52" ceiling fan from Home Depot (Model AL383LED-BN (made in China).Bought 2 of these for a family room at $48 each. Build quality seems good. All parts were supplied. The printed instructions and illustrations are good. The install was relatively easy.Negatives:(1) The steel base piece which attaches to the existing ceiling box and holds the fan is bar-shaped about 8 inches long and 2 inches wide. It's stiff and solid along its axis but too narrow to prevent wobble at 90 degrees when the fan turns (especially if the cutout for the ceiling box is slightly too large). A circular base plate would have helped to suppressed wobble in all directions, especially if you expect to be able to use the high and middle speeds. No balancing weights provided.(2) The fan motor and base plate bolt together stiffly. There's no ball-and-socket to let the fan find its true vertical. More speed, more wobble.(3) The housing above the motor is one-piece. The only way to get it off to shim for level and wobble is to take off all 5 blades. A two-piece housing would have fixed this.(3) The LED bulb is replaceable but you'd have to remove the entire light from the bottom of the fan to get at it. Not so great.Overall: sturdy enough but a better design wouldn't have cost so much more would it?

Product_Name: Kensgrove 54 in. Integrated LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control
Review_Header: The quality of this versatile large room ceiling fan is very good. All of the fan components are ...
Review_Text: The quality of this versatile large room ceiling fan is very good. All of the fan components are brushed nickel finished metal. The brushless motor is hefty and higher quality than the eco models. This is a 54 inch fan for medium to large rooms. This seems ideal for my 18 x 20 bedroom. The remote is what controls the fan functions. Assuming you already have a ceiling fan with a dual wall switch for fan and light with 4 wires at the ceiling box then this install is different as you will not be using the blue/pink light wire(wall switched). Only the black, white and ground wires will be used and the really good instructions will detail the install, but you will have to do some rethinking. I put the big 72 in fan in my garage shop and I really, really like it to move a lot or just stir the air around. Being able to dim the LED light down very low makes it a good night lite too, Actually, Home Decorators have updated the instructions since my first install 1-1/2 yrs ago to better explain everything . Plus, the upgraded remote now uses 2-AAA batts. instead of the little odd 12v battery my big fan uses. I have mounted this new fan in my bedroom using the close to ceiling install option because I have only 8 ft. ceiling. These fan blades are made of premium plywood with either an aged gray wood finish on one side or a matte painted silver finish on the other side which I chose, but may change sometime later. The fan runs quiet on all but the highest speeds. I sleep much better when I can feel a light breeze on my face.

Unless you love super loud beeping every time you turn you lights on or off, or increase/decrease fan speed, don't buy this product.  The beeping completely negates the ease of installation.

Review_Text: We bought this easy to install fan which my son installed over the long holiday weekend. Unfortunately, the last of 4 fans was an issue with working. We had to drive over 2 hours for this exchange. After the installation of the replacement fan, it also didn’t work. After much research and attempts to troubleshoot, I slid the battery out of the remote and back in place. I paired the remote and it worked !!! Such a long painless process to for a simple fix! Ugh but yay!

Product_Name: Channing 54 in. LED Indoor Easy Install Noble Bronze Ceiling Fan with HunterExpress feature set
Review_Text: The fan is very easy to install and looks nice but I only gave it 3 stars because the remote does not dim the lights.  I tried over and over, read and performed every instruction on how to dim the lights but they just stay the same. I bought this specifically for the dimming feature since this is for my living room and sometimes I want a dimmer light when I watch TV and brighter light when I am reading or doing crafts, etc.  I have the same bulbs I had in my old ceiling fan and they worked great so it is not the bulbs. The beeping is quite loud but that doesn't bother me since it is in the living room and not the bedroom.  I would definitely not recommend it for a bedroom.  I will be bringing this fan back to get a better one that actually dims.

Product_Name: Channing 54 in. LED Indoor Easy Install Noble Bronze Ceiling Fan with HunterExpress feature set
Review_Header: I really like the look of this fan and want to love it, but after installing and first turning it...
Review_Text: I really like the look of this fan and want to love it, but after installing and first turning it on, there is a loud humming noise coming from the motor on high. It works perfectly on medium and low, but the humming/drumming emitted from the motor on high just won't work. I looked at other reviews and reached out via email to the address provided by the Hunter team who has responded to other reviews with no response after 6 days - 4 business days. I checked the blades for balance and possible cracks as mentioned in the troubleshooting guide and all appears to be as it should. I've tried running the fan in both directions and get the same noise. I honestly don't want to take the fan down and return if there is an easy fix, but that's where I am. The lack of response from Hunter is as disappointing as the performance of the fan itself

Product_Name: Oakhurst 52 in. LED Indoor Low Profile New Bronze Ceiling Fan with Light Kit
Review_Header: I'd return it if I didn't already install it!
Review_Text: A 4.2 rating is respectable, but mine is definitely a 1. Total piece of junk. It's SUPER SLOW, and when it's on medium and high it makes an awful noise. I would definitely return it if I didn't have to uninstall it! The 15 year old fan I took down and replaced was way better than this 'new' one. Disappointed, fo sho.

Product_Name: Oakhurst 52 in. LED Indoor Low Profile New Bronze Ceiling Fan with Light Kit
Review_Header: Motor makes ticking noises and started humming
Review_Text: Pros: The fan looks great especially with the darker side of the blades, and it doesn’t have a lot of fan blade noise.Cons: The motor made ticking noises before I installed it right out of the box. I guess it’s the bearings. I thought maybe it’ll wear in, but a little over a week later it still makes them. The biggest thing and why I’m going to return it and look for another fan is it started humming. Aside from the ticking noises, when I first installed it it was hard to tell what speed it was on without watching the fan blades and paying attention the the number of times I pulled the fan chain. It’s been on medium speed and running for most the time it’s been installed, so I’m thinking it’s only going to get worst. Summary: I expected a better motor from a $80 fan considering I’ve had a lot of cheaper fans in the $40-50 range. I wanted something better looking this time that put out more light, but finding a fan that’s going to last without making noise is going to be one of those things.

Product_Name: Merwry 52 in. Integrated LED Indoor Matte Black Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control
Review_Header: We bought a Home Decorators Collection SW1422 BN (item #: 1001 028 991) ceiling fan.  The receive...
Review_Text: We bought a Home Decorators Collection SW1422 BN (item #: 1001 028 991) ceiling fan.  The receiver is supposed to go, according to the instructions, in the mounting bracket.  Then, the hanger ball goes in the mounting bracket under the receiver.  It is impossible to fit the receiver AND hanger ball in the mounting bracket. Why would they ask customers to do something that is impossible?  When I e-mailed the manufacturer, Summer Wind International, their response was, "Some people just aren’t smart enough to hang their own ceiling fans."

Review_Header: DISAPPOINTED - I bought this to replace a 15 year old 46" ceiling fan for my bedroom. I selected ...
Review_Text: DISAPPOINTED - I bought this to replace a 15 year old 46" ceiling fan for my bedroom. I selected the next size up from a brand that's been around for a long time, & I selected the one that had the highest air movement - over 4100 cfm. (with the down rod) Had professionally installed & I immediately had buyers remorse. This thing (on high) was barely noticeable - the 15 year old 46" one that had to be replaced blew this one out of the water. I guess in an effort to make them energy efficient today's fans just don't have the oomph that the older ones did. I guess I will live with it for now, until I can research & find something better.

Review_Text: We purchased two fans for our guest bedroom and office. Everything went well in installation until just past opening the box. I had electrical boxes installed in the ceiling by a licensed electrician and a problem was encountered right out of the chute. The new ceiling fan box was too small for the mounting bracket. It was necessary to drive to the hardware store and purchase an all-purpose crossbar that could be mounted on the electrical box and then mount the bracket on the crossbar. Everything about the installation after this problem was solved went as expected.The fan moves air and the light eliminates the room. The unit is stylish and is the right size for the room.

Product_Name: Altura 68 in. Indoor Oil Rubbed Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control
Review_Header: I purchased three of these fans to have matching fans on my first floor of my house. They worked ...
Review_Text: I purchased three of these fans to have matching fans on my first floor of my house. They worked great and moved a lot of air, unfortunately, when it came time to reverse the direction, one of the fans would not start back up. I got that one replaced, but withing the following year, I had replaced all three of them once, and two of them twice. Yes, I have gone through 5 of these fans, and now only two of them are working, due to me not turning them off. It is obvious that the start capacitor is too small and faulty for this fan, they are not difficult to replace, but yet again, I am unable to find one that will fit. You would think for the price they would last longer, but they don't. For an example, I have had a Hunter Douglas and Harbor Breeze fan in two of my bedrooms for over ten years and they still work perfectly. I will never buy another Home Decorators fan again, and I suggest you avoid buying one as well.    If i could I would give this product a negative number on the rating scale.

Product_Name: Altura 68 in. Indoor Oil Rubbed Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control

Product_Name: Altura 68 in. Indoor Oil Rubbed Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control
Review_Header: Had this since 2011 (now 2019). Looks amazing and great air flow. A few problems - remote stopp...
Review_Text: Had this since 2011 (now 2019). Looks amazing and great air flow. A few problems - remote stopped reversing after a couple of years. We replaced the reverse switch inside the fan but that didn't fix it. the fan speed also stopped working - stuck on a single speed, a single direction. Still don't care because I love the way it looks and the air flow. This week it stopped working altogether. I'm hoping I can fix it because it's worth the effort.

Product_Name: Altura 68 in. Indoor Oil Rubbed Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control
Review_Header: I bought 2 of these fans, the 60” and the next size down. They move a lot of air due to the shape...
Review_Text: I bought 2 of these fans, the 60” and the next size down. They move a lot of air due to the shape and pitch of the blades. Due to the design of the blades and pitch the fan is very effective even at the slower rpms. I see a lot of comments stating the speed of the fan is slower than expected, do your homework before purchasing, these are great! I’ve had mine for almost 2 years now and they are still quiet, well balanced, and easy to install. The smaller fan I added a Lurton fan control with 7 speeds and it has been working great the whole time. It runs practically every day.

Product_Name: Altura 68 in. Indoor Oil Rubbed Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control

Review_Text: This is a great fan overall. We have owned two of these fans in the past at another home. My only complaint is the remote electronics. Product_Name: Altura 60 in. Outdoor Oil-Rubbed Bronze Ceiling Fan
Review_Header: HORRIBLE. Cheap plastic blades, UGLY “remote,” light only works on HIGH FAN SETTING
Review_Text: Where do I even start?  This is HORRIBLE, but since we threw the box away already, we’re probably stuck with it.  The “ABS blades” are UGLY.  Altura fans are always wood blades that are beautiful, except apparently for this one.  We’ve owned a total of NINE in three houses over about twelve years, and needed one smaller than 68” for an office...the 48” with wood blades was too small.  We added the Hampton Bay universal light kit because they’ve changed the Altura light kit to a plastic dome, but apparently ALL light kits DON’T WORK unless the fan is on HIGH.  After a call to their customer service, that is how it’s supposed to work, and they claim that it’s because we don’t have separate wiring for the fan and light.  NONE of the other Altura fans required this, and the control of the separate light and fan was controlled by the control module.  And don’t get me started on the wall “remote.”  IT IS THE UGLIEST!  What happened to the standard remote that goes with these??  We just went to great expense to change out all of the light switches in the home to white Decora switches before putting the house on the market, but this wall-mounted control is BLUISH WHITE and doesn’t match anything...plus it’s BEVELED like cheap Vegas motel decor.  And you better hope you have paint...because the wallplate is smaller than a standard wallplate, so you’ll have to match the paint (see picture).  I HATE THIS FAN!

Product_Name: Altura 60 in. Outdoor Oil-Rubbed Bronze Ceiling Fan
Review_Text: We love our fan. Yes it turns slower than most fans but it moves a lot more air. The only problem we have is when it's on high it slows way down then speeds up again.

Product_Name: Connor 54 in. LED Brushed Nickel Dual-Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control
Review_Header: Fan looks great and works as advertised.  I have hung many a ceiling fan in my 71 years, and I'll...
Review_Text: Fan looks great and works as advertised.  I have hung many a ceiling fan in my 71 years, and I'll say for the record that they're all a pain in the rear to install.  I was looking forward to the easy installation this one promised but found it to be about the same as all the others when I got it home and went to work.As other remote fans, the send/receive unit is always a mystery.  I don't know why manufacturers can't write proper directions about how to get the mess of wires and this clunky receiver to fit within the cover of the fan housing, but they cannot.  The printed instructions did not show how to position the receiver nor did the wiring instructions WARN you that you have to cram all your house wires completely back inside the junction box.The remote unit slides on top of the hanging bracket.  There is exactly enough room for it to fit between the top of the bracket and if one little wire is hanging out either from the house or from the fan, it will not fit.  The instructions don't even tell you where the thing goes and the illustration next to that step appears to have it sitting lengthwise beside the hanging bracket which is definitely wrong.Finally, I resorted to going back to Home Depot and looking up the fan by item number.  They have (at least at this time) a video that does an excellent job showing you how to position the receiver.You have to pair the receiver and the remote control, which is easy.  You need to take the back off the battery compartment and there is a little button there to press after you electrify the unit.  Mine paired instantly.  I was a little worried as there are so many wireless and blue tooth devices running in the home office where I installed the fan, but it works fine.You would do well to have a little short Phillips head screwdriver, which is not mentioned in the installation instructions.  You have to re-attach a beauty ring to the bottom of the fan motor.  Once the motor is in place, you try to tilt it out of the way enough to get a long screwdriver to those screws but the motor hits the ceiling.  Trust me, you'll want a short 3" Phillips head screwdriver.  You do NOT need the crescent wrench they recommend; no idea why that's even there.So that's why the Ease of install got an average rating.  It took about 1 1/2 hours to hang and assemble everything.  If the remote transmitter had been better explained it probably would have taken an hour.  It's hard to tell the value when you first use the fan.  When it started up it made a brief sound like something was scraping but it stopped within a couple of seconds so we'll see how it holds up.  I saw smaller fans with remotes for twenty to thirty dollars less but none looked as good as this and the longer blades spread the air in a larger area of the room.  The light is super bright on the maximum setting.  The photo is with it on the dimmest setting.

Review_Header: The fan was installed late yesterday by an electrician. ...
Review_Text: The fan was installed late yesterday by an electrician.  It made some strange noises which he told me it just needed a bit of time to set in.  So I left it on low over night, and sure enough, it was whisper quiet this morning.  I really like the looks of this fan, and the light is very nice also.  However, I don't feel as much breeze from it as I expected.  I have 3 other ceiling fans thru out my home, which move more air.  However, they are all 54" fans.  This fan is 42".  It's installed in my kitchen.  It hasn't been very hot so far, so maybe I'll feel more cooling from it as the temperature rises.  All in all, I'm happy with it and it really looks nice.  The delivery was super fast,  less then 24 hrs.  The delivery men were very polite, even brought it in the house for me.  Good job Home Depot!!  Thank you.

Review_Header: I bought couple of this fans with some excitement due to good review, value for money and DC moto...
Review_Text: I bought couple of this fans with some excitement due to good review, value for money and DC motor. For one of the fan the receiver is not working. I opened the case with customer service "Case: 15375760 HDC - Ceiling Fan Receiver Replacement" on June 12 and provided receipt and other information. Since then I didn't hear from them and I kept on calling or mailing Peter R at Resolution Expediter – Private Brands 1-800-910-6704 ext. 85957.  Fan works but light is not working with the remote. So I am going to return all the fans I bought earlier out of frustration.Another head ache is that: both fan and light have on input and if you loose the remote, there is no way you control the fan. I wish they could have accept both inputs from the fan box. This is such a stupid design.

Product_Name: Kensgrove 72 in. LED Indoor/Outdoor Espresso Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control
Review_Header: The fan has exceeded my expectations with both performance, ease of installation and incredible s...
Review_Text: The fan has exceeded my expectations with both performance, ease of installation and incredible silence during operation. Including high speed. This fan replaced the 54" version of this (which has been moved to our much smaller loft area in the next room) in my bedroom as the room is HUGE and the fixture location is in the center of it, in which the fan though generating very high speed still didn't move enough cool air to allow me or my wife to feel it in bed which is along a far wall. My wife still used a pedestal fan for that reason. The 72" Kensgrove is a revelation. The diameter is much larger and the top speed is surprisingly much higher. I think though the main advantage of this over the 54" is the angle of blades where the 72" has a fairly steep angle versus the 54" has NONE. If you have a really big room you can't go wrong with the 72" Kensgrove for moving air. As for the remote it's identical to the one that comes with the 54" and is very easy to use. The only possible negative comment I can have is that for some people the included LED light kit might not be be bright enough on the highest setting but for us it is fine. This is a stellar piece of equipment. I highly recommend it.

Product_Name: Kensgrove 72 in. LED Indoor/Outdoor Espresso Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control
Review_Header: I am having the same issues that other have reported. It took a while to get the remote to sync w...
Review_Text: I am having the same issues that other have reported. It took a while to get the remote to sync with the fan and even with resetting it several times. I got the fan to work three times and once it was working and I turned it off. When i turn it back on again the fan didn't do anything beside spins forward and backward several times. When I got it working at high speed it didn't seem it was spinning at high speed especially with 8 blades and 72 in wide. For the money I paid, it should work without spending hours to get it to work. I prefer remote control that is sync with switched that match the fan receiver with the remote receiver. I am returning it today to home depot.

Product_Name: Channelside 52 in. LED Indoor/Outdoor Noble Bronze Ceiling Fan with Remote Control
Review_Header: Fan itself is great, great installation instructions, cool look, good...
Review_Text: Fan itself is great, great installation instructions, cool look, good light.  But...I installed two on my patio and did not wire wall switches in to them and the first one was paired with it's remote fine.  But when I turned off the breaker to install the second and then turned the power on (to both fans) the battery was not yet in the second remote and so the fan paired with the first remote.  Then as I installed the battery in the second remote, it operated the second fan and light fine but the first remote was also paired with the second fan and as such is paired with both fans.  So the first remote operates both fans and lights fine.  The second remote operates the second fan and light fine.  I now have to un-wire each fan independently and pair them separately again to be able to get the second remote to JUST operate the second fan.  Some might prefer one remote running both fans but I do not as they are remotely different areas for different uses and will rarely need to both be on together (entertaining only).  A small thing but a pain for me.

Product_Name: Merwry 52 in. Integrated LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control
Review_Header: Incredibly disappointing! I WOULD NOT recommend this fan, so please select another one. This ceil...
Review_Text: Incredibly disappointing! I WOULD NOT recommend this fan, so please select another one. This ceiling fan was purchased to replace a older ceiling fan. After installing the fan, it works on Hi or Off. Medium and Low fan speed buttons don't work. Also, when you dim the light it makes a loud humming noise. In other words if you have the light on Hi and the fan on Hi, the fan works perfectly. It cools great, looks great and doesn't shake at all. You can turn the light off, with no problems. If you adjust anything from this setting issues and/ or problems occur.Med/Low fan speed doesn't work. Dim the light from Hi to a lower setting a loud humming sound occurs. Turn the light on the brightest setting or turn it off completely the fan works great. Have the fan on hi or off your fine too. I would give this fan a 2 star on looks, it doesn't wobble and on Hi light and Hi fan it works perfectly. If you have to adjust anything from this setting your in trouble buddy. In this day and age, this is totally unacceptable. Would have to dissemble, place back in the box return to the store. Then buy another fan and reinstall that one was too much of a hassle, so I unfortunately decided to leave it alone. Stuck with it. Incredibly disappointing! I WOULD NOT recommend this fan, select another one. Trust me.

Product_Name: Merwry 52 in. Integrated LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control
Review_Header: Was pretty easy to put together and hangup. Really helps...
Review_Text: Was pretty easy to put together and hangup. Really helps keep our livingroom cool, thr light is amazing and works great! I also love having a remote, so when I am busy I can quickly turn on or off the light or fan for my kiddo.

Product_Name: Merwry 52 in. Integrated LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control
Review_Header: The quality of the fan is OK, but the installation instructions are horrible.   The two screws in...
Review_Text: The quality of the fan is OK, but the installation instructions are horrible.   The two screws in the mounting bracket (that hold the canopy in place) should be removed BEFORE installing the mounting bracket.   Luckily, I have offset screwdrivers that allowed me remove these screws after the bracket was installed (and the fan had been wired).  Also, the remote control module is a very tight fit into the mounting bracket. I have installed probably 30 ceiling fans over the years and this one was the most difficult.   I will stick with Hunter next time.

Product_Name: Merwry 52 in. Integrated LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control
Review_Header: Review the installation instructions online before purchase.... this helped me understand the ste...
Review_Text: Review the installation instructions online before purchase.... this helped me understand the steps and requirements for a properly fitted electrical junction box to mount the fan. Once I found my current box was fastened very securely to a joist, I was able to do the installation. You need a wire cutter/stripper in addition to screwdrivers. Follow the instructions to the letter, be careful and take your time.... it will fine. The remote receiver does fit in the metal bracket which holds the down-rod, again.... read the instructions thoroughly.I like the LED dimming light, the modern look of the fan and the quiet operation. It hangs close to the ceiling and seems perfect for our room. We're happy with this purchase.

Product_Name: Merwry 52 in. Integrated LED Indoor Brushed Nickel Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote Control

Review_Text: The only problem I had was with the conopy  cover. You need to make both the screw holes Key hole style. I fought that thing for over 2 hours and finally gave up, with just the one screw.

Once installed, everything worked as expected. If you're looking for a easy DIY product (which a ceiling fan install is), but aren't handy/confident in making modifications...Stay Away From This One.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Put this on our screened in porch and it lights it up pretty well. I also like that the remote comes with a hook to mount on a wall so that we hopefully don't lose it!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Love it! Great quality!! Beautiful touch to our porch.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "The best ceiling fan I ever had."
Review_Text: It's not on the description online or on the outside of the packaging; but the nice surprise was that the light is dimmable. I love the looks of the fan with the copper toning on it and the seeded glass. I have the fan flush mounded and it works great!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "FANtastic Fans for the Indoor Pool Area"
Review_Text: These fans are Beautiful and will hold up to the High Humidity in my Pool Area. Thanks a Million !

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I never really bother writing reviews but I rely on them quite a bit. Anyway, I just woke up from a nap on my screen porch and looked up at my ceiling fan that I installed a few years ago and felt compelled to write this review. After a few years of service this fan is still going strong. Still looks great an there is very little sag to the blades. It does stay covered under the porch roof so it's never in direct sunlight and can't get rained on. The remote is still working and very handy. I think I initially selected this unit for its looks and the remote. I have the remote mounted on the wall and treat it like a light switch. I didn't have to wire in a switch which was nice. Overall my wife and I are very pleased with this fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "I have 4 of these excellent porch fans!"
Review_Text: 5 years ago we bought these large ceiling fans for our front and back porches. Lowe's puts a lifetime warranty on them!! One developed a problem and I called to order the part which was no longer available. “No problem, it has a lifetime warranty. Take it to Lowe's and get a new one!” As the expression goes, “Easy Breezy!” Thank you MyLowes!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Bought three of these and love them!"
Review_Text: My wife asked for ceiling fans on our front porch. Nine years ago. Not being one to procrastinate, I finally got around to it this weekend. These were super easy to install and they look fantastic. I'm particularly impressed by the remote function. She loves it!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This not only cools, but helps to keep the flies away. Was fairly easy to put up in one afternoon and using in the evening. The dimming light is nice, as you can have it bright or lower for great ambiance, while sitting outside enjoying the evening with a glass of wine.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Really wanted to like this - don't take the risk!"
Review_Text: Bought this fan based on the display model being the dark color seen here on the listing. The photo on the box is an ugly pinkish-orange, but the local employee said they are the color of the display. Got it home and unfortunately, ours was the color of the photo! Back it went.We asked to see the product in the box after finding one with a different manufacture date. Fortunately it was dark, antique bronze like the display. Got it home, installed it on our enclosed porch. Looks great, but we turn it on and hear a deep whomp, whomp rhythmic sound on speeds one and two (even inside the house we could hear this!). Speed three adds an annoying, rather loud, humming sound. We still tried to talk ourselves into being o.k. with it saying we will not likely use high speed; after all a lot of hot sweaty work went into putting this up. However we stopped into the competitor and took a look at outdoor fans. Decided to buy one there even though we had to pay more to get a remote which is included with the Merrimack. The Merrimack is uninstalled and boxed up and the new fan with a "quiet motor technology +" is silent! So glad we didn't settle.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan is beautiful, but the remote quit working after five years of use, rendering it useless. Lowe's did accept a return for store credit and that was much appreciated.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "We've replaced these a total of 3 times"
Review_Text: Our landlord installed 2 of these on our lanai in Florida in August 2016. Without a doubt they are lovely and the fan itself puts out good airflow. HOWEVER within 3-8 weeks either the fan stops working, or the light, or both. We've replaced 1 in warranty once, and replaced the other in warranty 3 times now (for a total of 4 in that spot). The landlord's take is that as long as Lowe's keeps replacing them under warranty he'll keep taking the time to remove and re-install.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Although the ceiling fan looked great installed, it made a period humming noise that could have been electrical or vibration (although I used the balancing kit to balance the fan) from the beginning and my experience says it will not go away on its own, just get worse. I installed it outdoors under a patio cover. I returned it. Bought a Hunter, no noise, and no need to balance it.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Put two of these on my covered patio 6 years ago. The one I use the most fan works but lights are screwy, one socket never worked right. The other fan I use very seldom was on last night and just quit turning, turns free by hand. Light no longer responds to remote either just stays on. These were a "Lowe's exclusive buy" at the time, I have learned the hard way about those on several things!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: After having had this fan for a few years, the remote stopped working out of the blue. A quick internet search reveals this is a pretty common issue with Harbor Breeze fans. Replaced batteries and reprogrammed (per the instructions included with the fan) to no avail. I called Harbor Breeze customer support and was told that the remote is no longer available...not even for purchase. They said none of the universal remotes work with this model either so I now have a very expensive fan that does not function as a fan. DO NOT BUY a Harbor Breeze fan that requires a remote to use as they will not provide proper customer support when the remote stops working which is apparently inevitable.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Fan is great, light not so much"
Review_Text: Purchased our home in May of 2017 with this fan in my sons room and the light will not shut off with remote. We have changed batteries and nothing corrected. Fan works great but only have it running during day, he cant use at night because of light not turning off. Wanting to replace for my son to have a fan and light that works.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Light fixture is not very bright so don't rely on it to provide lighting for room. Love the look and the fan

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Got two of these for my screened in patio and was pleased with looks and functionality. After a few years one of the fans quit and found the remote receiver was no longer responding to the signal. I search high and low for a replacement and couldn't find it anywhere. I hate to replace the fan as I want the two fans the same style. Somewhat disappointed

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan is quiet and remote control makes it convenient to use. My only concern is; how do I control this fan if the remote control fails.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: really looked for the right fan and this is worth the investment. like the style of the blades which contrast the covered patio ceiling. good air movement which in southern Mississippi is really important. so far, not disappointed.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Merrimack 52-in Antique Bronze Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great looking fans that do the job of cooling, adjustable lighting and remotes. Like the fans and am hoping they honor the lifetime warranty. Second fan light is on but fan doesn't work. Can't turn light off either (remote only way to turn these fans and lights off and on (besides light switch). There is no pull chain.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan installed very easily. It is quiet and does not shake or wobble (after balancing). It is a great option if you are looking for a cheap fan that works.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This seems to be a well made fan. I put it up myself with ease. It looks great, blows great, and not a wobble anywhere. I have 3 Harbor Breeze fans in my home and like them very much. Highly recommend.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is perfect for our need. It cools our large bedroom nicely and lights out room perfectly. I am going to buy 2 more for the other bedrooms!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: very easy to install. smooth operation. like the screw on light covers and small light bulbs. quality seems very good.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Normally , a ceiling fan will have a slight sway or rocking to it.This fan does not move at all. It's not in a bind- it can move- it just doesn't. It's balanced and smooth as silk.You can not hear it run, just the sound of the air moving.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: nice fan, good quality, good price- no issues at all

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This is a very easy to install, quiet and dependable ceiling fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We purchased two of these today, each took about 2 hours for installation and some cursing but no more than normal, I thought the instruction book was very straightforward and simple. Someone else said they couldn't close-mount theirs, but ours came with everything for it and we did close-mount them. Two things to know: 1: make sure you have electrical tape for the wiring2: make sure you buy the screws to mount the bracket to the actual electrical box- those are NOT included. Bulls are included, I plan to purchase new ones as they are 60w incandescent with a tiny socket. I'll find some led version and save a lot of electricity. But nice they were included at all! All in all, they look GREAT, are working perfectly and silently, and they can go with our farmhouse/rustic theme on a nice budget! I wish we have bought these a while back.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Really pretty - easy to assemble; bright light. Installed it in my living room and it works great!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan! Easy to install. Very happy with the purchase!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I have several of these in my house. They work very very well and are very quiet.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought two of these for my condo on MauiGreat fanNice and quiet Nice light with bulbs included

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan was really easy to assemble and hang. I love it. Plus it came with the light bulbs too!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I love the quality! I love the color! I love the quietness! I love how it fits the space! I Love This Fan!!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It works perfect for the space and gives the room a newer feel with just the right amount of air flow!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Standard fan that does the job. I do wish the lightbulbs were a standard size though

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great for the price. It didn't connect well with my current hanging pole so I had to drill a hole. But for the price it'll work.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased this fan over the weekend and attempted to hang it yesterday. The metal on the canopy is cheap and flimsy, when trying to attach it to the bracket, it kept wanting to bend. I finally thought I had it hung and was getting ready to add the second screw on each side of the canopy, when the metal tab snapped off. The fan fell. I will be returning this one and purchasing another brand. Very frustrating...guess you get what you pay for.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Excellent fan! My children are sleeping way cooler now. Picked up two of tbese bad boys from Lowes during a sale. Couldn't be more happier. Rated it 4 stars just because I just got them a couple of weeks ago and I wanted to give it some time before giving it 5 stars.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan - love it. Replaced the bulbs with LEDs so they give off less heat, but other than that - no issues!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Review_Text: the Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit. 5in Blade ceiling fan works great. real movies the air and is very pleasing to the looks of are front room.

Review_Text: Bought two of these for my condo on MauiGreat fanNice and quiet Nice light with bulbs included

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great ceiling fan for my guest room. Cools the area and you can feel the breeze.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is exactly as advertised appears to be good quality. The instructions were clear and easy to read. Can be mounted 3 different ways hanging, angled, or flush I chose flush. The installation is not hard depends on your comfort level. Kit has every thing you need if replacing an existing fan if new install will need an electrician. Once wired, installed and balanced this is the quietest fan I have ever had.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Love the fan. It is very quiet and puts out lots of air.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice price. This was a replacement purchase for a fan we'd had a while. I had not replaced one before and while I'm handy, these instructions were some of the best I've seen. Made it easy to install. works nicely too.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We purchased two of these today, each took about 2 hours for installation and some cursing but no more than normal, I thought the instruction book was very straightforward and simple. Someone else said they couldn't close-mount theirs, but ours came with everything for it and we did close-mount them. Two things to know: 1: make sure you have electrical tape for the wiring2: make sure you buy the screws to mount the bracket to the actual electrical box- those are NOT included. Bulls are included, I plan to purchase new ones as they are 60w incandescent with a tiny socket. I'll find some led version and save a lot of electricity. But nice they were included at all! All in all, they look GREAT, are working perfectly and silently, and they can go with our farmhouse/rustic theme on a nice budget! I wish we have bought these a while back.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I wanted to lighten up my den and this fan did the trick. It's absolutely silent! I highly recommend this fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This product provides a nice new look to my living room

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It blows alot of air, looks great, and is quiet, the only complaint is that the shades are practically irreplaceable if you break one. Luckily, a very nice employee gave us a shade for free off of a display model. Other than that I would recommend!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We recently purchased this item for our guest room remodel and was very happy with the ease of installation and function that we have purchased it again for our third guest room!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This is a great looking fan that was easy to install. I installed it along with a remote control kit. The fan works perfectly and is very quiet.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This is one of the best ceiling fans I have ever bought. Its beautiful and I absolutely love how you can change the fan blades from a light brown to a dark brown so no matter what you do to the kitchen, it will always match!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased 4 of the Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in ceiling fans and absolutely love them. I love where you can have your blades light tan or dark tan. Also the 3 lights with the globes really brighten my rooms.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great product easy to install looks good and works well

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Metal on canopy that attaches to bracket is crap~"
Review_Text: I just purchased this fan over the weekend and attempted to put it up today. The little metal tabs on the canopy that attaches to the mounting bracket are so thin and cheap they kept giving out. I finally thought I had the thing up and was preparing to put in the 2nd screw on each side of the canopy into the mounting bracket when the dang tab snapped and the fan started falling. Very poor quality. I just attempted to straighten the other side and it snapped off like plastic. Going to take it back, there is absolutely no way to hang it as it is and there is no way I will purchase another one. Frustrating to say the least.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: New color & great price. Bought online & used in store pickup.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We LOVE this fan. It is much quieter than our old fan---you literally cannot hear it at all, just the sound of the air moving. We were surprised at the brightness of the light, as we'd read reviews that said it wasn't very bright. Ours is VERY bright. Great value, a sturdy, well-made item.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "We Bought Three - One for Each Bedroom"
Review_Text: We purchased three of these, one for each bedroom on the uppermost level of our home. They have already contributed to a reduced electric bill, work like a charm, and are so attractive as well. We love them.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We bought 4 and have installed 2 this far, LOVE them! They circulate air well and make a world of a difference in the temp of the rooms

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan went in easily. Makes a major difference in living room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Quick and easy install. The generous 52 inch blade span really does an excellent job at cooling the room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Very easy install, perfect for the room size. We love the new look

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I would give this a 5 star rating if it lit up the room better. I have the fan in our guest room. It is quiet and the fan runs smooth.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: they work really well and are very smooth and quiet. but the metal smell takes a day or two to go away.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Order 2 fans to replace older fans in our sunroom. fans were easy to put together and install.One odd thing was that the fans pulls were different between the two fans ordered.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan was the right price and size for my patio. Plus it's rated for out side. It Was easy to put together and instructions were easy to follow. With my 10% military discount it was a winner . It also came 2 days before the scheduled delivery. Great experience

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I'm able to offer this fan in the bedrooms of my investment properties for very little premium over what a standard light would cost.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: First, the bronze color is more of a very flat, dark brown. That's the only negative to this review. Really. The hardware was preinstalled where it could be, making assembly very easy. Rubberized strips separate possible friction and noise areas. Hardware is great. It's quiet, and it was balanced nicely. The LED light is adequate, but will not light an entire room, just like any ceiling fan I've ever purchased. This is a great fan for a small bedroom/study. Frankly, it's the easiest fan to install I've done. On sale or not, it's a bargain.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Put in our dining room and works great for what we want. Keeps the air circulating and plenty of light. We are not fancy and this is great for us.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan is easy to install and a good price, but there is a constant hum when turned on. I would not recommend for a bedroom.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Bronze LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The motor part of the fan is supposed to slide into the mounting bracket they give you...mine didn't. I took the bracket off the ceiling to try all angles - they didn't fit. I bent the part that is supposed to insert to make it fit...still didn't fit. After spending a couple hours trying to install something that should have been very simple, I now have to try to make a couple more hours to try to return the fan before the 90 day return runs out. :(Seemed like the fan was decent quality, I'm just frustrated a wrong part ended up in my box.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: Looks great and easy install. Love the style and it's very quiet. Definitely recommend.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan spreads air in a 18 x 24 room I recommend this to anybody that needs to cool space in a large room. We also have a 72” in our great space that moves air very easily. Your going to like this fan. Installation should be performed by a qualified person that understands the remote hookup. This is an additional step from a standard ceiling fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: This is the second one I have purchased and I am very pleased with how it performs.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: I have installed over a dozen of these in both sizes in different projects, inside residential, outdoor residential, indoor commercial. These are about the best fans I have found, a clean modern contemporary look, excellent CFM rating, something most people rarely look at in specifying a fan. Quiet. One unit had a remote that did not work but customer service resolved quickly. They are a beautiful piece with above average quality.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice looking fan. Super quiet. My only complaint is the speeds. Hard to tell when they adjust up or down. Other than that, really elegant looking fan. Moves air around just as described.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan is nice, quite, and simple enough to install even though it was the first ceiling fan I ever installed. Minor complaint is the bulb socket size but given the price I am just happy it came with bulbs.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased this fan because I wanted to update my living room in addition to updating flooring. Was so happy with this purchase, the fans itself have a light brown side and a maple look on the other side, so depending on your decor you can choose what color meshes better. Love the brush nickel. I am happy with this purchase.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy to to install. Nice appearance. Very stylish.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It works perfect for the space and gives the room a newer feel with just the right amount of air flow!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I wanted to lighten up my den and this fan did the trick. It's absolutely silent! I highly recommend this fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan has been discontinued and i had to call around and finally found a store in Houston with some in stock. I drove 45 minutes and bought 3 of them for $40 bucks each. The fan is great, quiet, bright light, and put out a lot of air. Highly recommend if you can find any.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I WAS DESPERATE. LIGHT IN BEDROOM WOULD NOT COME ON. ELECTRITION STATED I NEEDED A NEW UNIT. WENT TO LOWES FOR NEW CAN KITI WAS REALLY SURPRISED THY HAD EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED/WANTED. THE PRICE WAS MUCH LOWER THAN I HAD EXPECTED.ELECTRITION INSTALLED IT AN IT WORKS GREAT. ELECTRITION WAS ALSO SURPRISED BY LOW COST. IT IS WORKING GREAT AND LIGHT IS PERFECT FOR THE ROOM

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The directions are fantastic. The quality is amazing for the money. This can be done by amateurs. Easier with two people. The bulbs that come with it are nice. The two color choices for the fan blades could pretty well match anything. I would put this up against any of the higher priced fans. We personally were glad that it didn't come with a remote because we don't have high ceilings and the place was wired for a separate fan switch. Love love love it. *Have not tested longevity* only installed today. Personal opinion: this may be a tad large for a small small bedroom.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It's a great fan especially for the money. Very easy to install and looks great. The highest setting is pretty good it will cool you down quickly

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan that moves a lot of air and is super easy to install!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Our old fan was pitchin a fit and couldn't balanced. This one is a beautiful fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: this was an excellent buy for the quality and price....wowwwwwww

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: For years we have been wanting a fan over our dinning room table. I saw this fan and decided it was the one. It was easy to install and looks really great in the room. It is so quiet and moves the air around to cool the room quickly. Please pics are before and after install.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Had to replace a ceiling fan in our master bedroom and caught this one on sale. Got the old fan down and put this one up on the short down rod supplied, got it all hooked up and it works nice and looks great. The man in the fan & lighting said he had this same fan in his house and it worked really good as well. The install was easy.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This product provides a nice new look to my living room

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Originally I bought a cheap ceiling fan that not just looked bad it made a clicking noise that I could not balance or fix. Went to Lowe's bought this one easier to nostalgia looks and works great

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Very easy installation. Looks beautiful. Runs very quietly. Highly recommend!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Great ceiling fan at a clearance rice"
Review_Text: Works as advertized. Neat and simple design. Installation was straightforward as instructions indicated.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Barnstaple Bay 52-in White Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased this fan over the weekend and attempted to hang it yesterday. The metal on the canopy is cheap and flimsy, when trying to attach it to the bracket, it kept wanting to bend. I finally thought I had it hung and was getting ready to add the second screw on each side of the canopy, when the metal tab snapped off. The fan fell. I will be returning this one and purchasing another brand. Very frustrating...guess you get what you pay for.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Antique Brass LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Antique Brass LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Antique Brass LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: we needed a new fan for the kitchen after looking at all the fanes we chose this one we really like it.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Antique Brass LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: A nice fan for the price

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Antique Brass LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I am purchasing these fans for my new home that's being built and will purchase four more in next few months

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Antique Brass LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Quality parts and finish of all items in the box. easy installation with no misfit of assembly. Fan is quiet running and thre were no fan wobbling as with fans i have installed in the past. Highly recommend this product line.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Antique Brass LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is so much more quiet that the one we got rid of. I love the look with our furniture.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I like to ceiling fan looks real nice nice and quiet The only thing is that it needs more lights.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Parts are lightweight and thin, leading me to believe they can break easy. The fan does look nice when completed, but I will probably spend a bit more next time for a better quality fan. Installation was standard and pretty easy until the end. When attaching the light pan to the light kit, there is only about a quarter inch between each screw and the light socket. Even my 90-degree screwdriver would not fit in there. I had to unscrew the socket from the light kit to tighten the screws.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought to replace a 15 year old ceiling fan. Installation was good until it came time to secure the lower collar that connects the dome over the light. It was designed to be a bit awkward to install the 3 screws required to keep in place. Honestly that was the only issue I have with the ceiling fan. Once installed it operated smoothly with no need for balance adjustments. Quite operation and no jangling with chains at any speed.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Good fan, but could be a bit quieter (click,click,Click.....)

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: You get what you pay for. Light not so bright. Nearly impossible to balance.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought to replace old lighting. Easy install, looks good and moves the air as intended

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great economical fan for apartment bedroom. Easy to install and both light and fan work great. If you are looking for an economically priced fan you can't go wrong.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We bought this fan needing more air circulation in our spare room and it does the job. Looks great and was easy to install. Love it except for one thing....the lighting. It comes with its on LED light, but its very dull light and not bright enough. We had to go to Home Depot to buy a LED light that was brighter than the one it came with. Watch the Watts... you cannot go over 6 watts. Other than the lighting......A+

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan ! Great price and works well very smooth but the light is not bright at all. Went to Home Depot to get brighter one only have 60W. Will keep trying other places.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is a good purchase for the price. No frills, but works well.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: You get what you pay for, however I only paid $50 and I feel like I got more air movement than $50 is worth. Definitely better than most other builder fans. Pretty cheap quality and a bit tricky to install but again, you get what you pay for.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: A great buy & good price. Perfect for our guest room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I have installed 8 of these in my rent houses and everyone loves them. A little slow to install. But worth it.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Love this fan! It looks expensive and love the price @ $39.99 So of course I got four to put in my home! Its quiet and gives of circulation.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Has worked great and the install was straightforward. The only upgrade I would like to see is a plastic guide when the pull cords go through the housing since they sometimes catch depending on what direction you pull them from. I would definitely buy this fan again.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This product is very dependable and have not had one fail me yet. Will continue to purchase

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I waited several weeks b4 giving my review to see how they would hold up...I bought 2 of this particular model of the Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-inch fan, & 1 more fan of this same brand, but with 4-lights at a higher price & I couldn't be happier with the performance of all 3-fans!!! I run them continuously with no problems, no bad odors or loud motor sounds! They were installed by Lowe's so I was secure that the install would be fast & professionally done & it was!!! My last fans that I replaced were purchased at a store closing sale(Montgomery Wards)& I had no problems with them either except that we have been updating our home and all the fans were a BRASS color and we have gone to all stainless appliances as well as all the other fixtures in the home so it made sense to replace all the fans even though they were still working well...I am very happy with the performance of this brand of fans & I am sure they will last well over the 20+ years like my old ones! I would buy this brand again & I do highly recommend them too!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice value. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. Fast and easy online purchase.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: For the price you can't go wrong. Looks good works fine. Under 1 hr install for a novice. I bought 2 more!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Has a large base and covered where the old one was. Easy to install.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We purchased 2 of these fans because they were on sale and loved them so much we purchased 2 more! They look great, super easy install, they are very quiet and definitely add the finishing touch to each room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought two of these ceiling fans for two bedrooms in our home. They are quiet and effectively circulate the air. I would recommend them!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought a couple of the Harbor breeze fans for my rental property. They look great and hold up a long Time. I was so glad to catch them on sale.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan worked great for tight location. Instructions were above average for accuracy. Good value!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great product & price. Easy to install. Airflow works great.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought two of these at Lowe's to replace 2 failed fans in the basement. Construction is great. Paid less than $36 per fan. What surprised me the most was the virtual zero wobble without any blade weights and balancing marathon. Almost completely silent at at high speed. Took a bit over an hour for each install.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Works great moves a good amount of air and looks great over all great value !!!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Wife and I installed 2 fans in 2 bedrooms. The fans were easy to assemble. The installation could have easily been 2 hours but the screws were stripped in the old fans that we were replacing so it took longer. Definitely a 2 person job. The fans are very quite when running, even on the high setting. Very pleased with the look and finish. Was able to grab these at $35.98 during the Black Friday sale, well worth the price!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This ceiling fan was fairly simple to install. works great. Very happy with our purchase.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan looks beautiful in my living room! Moves the air great. Provides just the right amount of light. Easy to install, which I loved!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fast service on a new ceiling fan. I bought 2 more because of the value received.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It was easy to install and the price was fantastic. It looks great in my kitchen! I leave it on all the time to keep the air moving. It's really improved the temperature upstairs by pulling the cold air downstairs up.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Needed a great bedroom fan, this is it."
Review_Text: Hot bedroom demand a fan. Bought and installed(VERY EASY) the harbor breeze fan. The fan with the Light included made a world of difference.Visitors in the spare bedroom commented how comfortable the room was on a very hot evening. Great value!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Nice fan for the price. Works as advertised"
Review_Text: Got this on sale for 39.99. Purchased the 2 year plan just in case if the motor blows out.. Installation was pretty straight forward. I was able to do it myself without any help but it took about 2 hours to do the whole thing. Installing the blades was the most annoying or difficult part but rest of it was pretty straight forward. Tested everything and it works like a charm.. The room that I put this in is probably a 13 x 11 bedroom and there was plenty of air flow. Please note that the advertised speed for this fan is 2500 CFM.. I had earlier bought an hampton bay from Home depot for the same price and this fan definitely looked better in quality compared to that.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan was on sale and worth every penny. It is pleasing to the eye, very quiet, the fan and light pulls are long enough for a short person to reach them, and the light is just right.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This is a beautiful, high quality fan. I was amazed of how nice it was for the price. The two color blade option (light or dark wood) was a nice plus. I would definitely recommend this product.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I love the simple and functional contemporary design. And the price was awesome. Purchased 4 of them. On sale for $40. each!Can't beat that.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Needed a new ceiling fan for our bedroom but not wanting to spend a fortune! This fan has amazing quality for such a small price!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
