Review_Text: I purchased this ceiling fan to replace the one in our livingroom. Since we rent our house and the owner was not willing to replace the previous one that died, I didn't want to spend a lot of money and this fan was perfect! Looks beautiful in our livingroom, provides a good amount of air and lighting, and is quiet. And the price couldn't be beat!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy to install and works great. Good ceiling fan at a good price

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Order it online; picked it up at the store within the hour, no fuss! Loved the convenience of online ordering! The ceiling fan is great, it's quiet and circulates the air nicely. I'm looking forward to a lower electric bill with this additional fan in my living space.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Flush mount ceiling fan with LED bulb light kit."
Review_Text: Fan was very easy to install. Looks very good over my dining room table. I really like the LED light, saves energy and provides adequate lighting.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: What a great fan for the price $39, easy to install our last one lasted 18 years. A beautiful addition to our living room, 52-inch blades a great addition to any family room living room Den or bedroom I would highly recommend this ceiling fan to anyone that's in need. You don't have to spend an arm and a leg thinking that spending hundreds of dollars you get the best one out there this Harbor Breeze ceiling fan the first one lasted us 18 years I highly recommend went to anyone looking to purchase a new ceiling fan ours runs 24/7.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased this fan to replace the light in my bedroom. It was a great price and it looks amazing! Easy to install, quiet motor, great output of air. Looks more expensive than it was.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Was looking for ceiling fans for a new house and stumbled on these. Was expecting to pay double what this fan cost ($40). It works great and an easy install. Just wish it had two bulbs instead of one. But hey only $40. I bough eight of them with no ossues

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Purchased two for my children's bedrooms. The fan motor is quiet even when on the highest setting. Very simple installation, we had both installed in under an hour. Perfect fan choice for those who want an easy install, nice fan without busting the budget.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Love these ceiling fans! I bought one for each bedroom upstairs and they look great! They are extremely quiet as well.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It was easy to install and quiet. It was a great price and looked and worked great

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: 52" ceiling fan with LED light, works great, looks great, on sale 39.99 an excellent buy

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This is a very nice fan, it runs very quiet and it's very easy to install and most of all the price is good, I purchased 3 of them.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We happened to see this on sale and went ahead and bought one to replace a smaller fan we had. Installed it, loved it, and went right back and bought 4 more to replace all the fans throughout the house. They look really classy and sure move the air around

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I love my new ceiling fan! Its simple and elegant at the same time.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I put this fan up a few months ago and the (not so) long-lasting LED light bulb has already gone out. I didn't realize when I bought this fan that it doesn't take standard light bulbs - it uses a smaller A15 light bulb. I was so disappointed that I'm having to replace the bulb already, and doubly so upon discovering that I'll also have to use more expensive replacements. I wouldn't buy this again, despite the fact that it looks pretty good for the $39 sale price I paid for it. I'll spend what I saved on specialty replacement bulbs.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Beautiful fan but doesn't give off good lighting"
Review_Text: Bought this for our living room but taking it back because it leaves our room too dark. Bummed because we loved the way the fan looked (and you can't beat the price!) but it just doesn't give off good light.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Good fan for the price. Globe too small."
Review_Text: Nice fan. Quiet. It supports a E26 base bulb but the globe is too small. Globe should be big enough to accommodate up to a standard A19 bulb. I'm thinking they are doing that because people still use incandescent bulbs which are too hot. LED (and CFL) are the way to go now. Still they should have a larger globe option for A19 LED and CFL bulbs.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "only 3 stars due to labeling on box"
Review_Text: BEWARE of the Labeling or lack of on box! I Did not install, as it would not work on a inclined ceiling, it is a flush mount, it mounts flush to a flat ceiling and there is no down rod. this is not stated on the box. had it all unpacked and read the instructions only to discover the above fact. it was going to replace my current fan that is nearly 15 years old and starting to fail. will have to find a different one.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: they were on sale 2 of 3 are really loud for a fan taking them all down and returning dont buy these kind

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Toxic Odor - Do NOT Buy This Fan"
Review_Text: This fan seemed like a great deal - it is large, stylish, and was only $40. Now I know why. I installed it and after running it for 40 minutes, the room filled with a toxic smell that made my husband and I sick. We ran it for a few hours, hoping it would burn off, but it never did. We turned off the fan, opened the windows and aired it out overnight and the room still smelled. Had to take it down and install a new fan(different brand this time and not from Lowes), which was a royal pain. From the reviews and posts elsewhere on the internet, I am guessing that some but not all of these fans are toxic so buying them is a bit like Russian roulette. Now I know why the discount on them was so deep. I would give it a negative number rating if I could for all the effort and time it cost me. These fans present a health risk and Lowes should take them off the market rather than sell them at a discount.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I would not recommend this fan to anyone. There is a pungent odor almost like an electric smell that won't go away. I will be returning this fan ASAP. This odor is so strong that I had to turn the fan off open a few windows and sit in another room. This fan could potential be a hazard!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Not too bad to put up, looked great for the price, just didn't last. Motor began making a loud noise 3 months after installation.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Seemed like a great fan and assembly went great until the very last step. The design of the light fixture with 3 tiny screws that are almost inaccessible makes adding the light globe almost impossible. The appearance is nice, but not worth the installation of that last step. There are so may other designs for fans that go together without difficulty, I don't know why anyone would think this is a good idea. If I hadn't already had it installed before I started trying to add the light globe I would have taken it back and bought a different fan from a different store.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchase this ceilign fans becuase I was looking for a budget friendly option. I saw some of the reviews complaining about the smell, but decided to give them a try, the installation was easy and everything looked great. I did noticed some smell when i pull the fan out of the box but thought it would go away. After runnig both of my fans I started to notice an awfull smell almost immediatley, I decided to give them a tey thinking the smell would go away, after a month of having the ceiling fans the smell still there. I dont think these ceiling fans should be sold. Stay away from this ceiling fans at all possible.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: it likes great.... the fan is for show only... get no air

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan looks amazing and works well. Nice and quiet. Was a little skeptical at first because I read several reviews complaining about the speed. There is plenty of speed -the fan is huge and doesn't need to spin at Mach 10 like a smaller fan. We have 20ft ceiling and never go past setting 3.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Love the fan super quiet lots of wind movement. 6 speeds no vibrations. Led is brighter then I thought it would be. Only problem is cost lucky I got on sale.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought for high peaked ceiling in a summer cottage. Used 4' drop pipe. Reverse on remote allows spin to change directions and turn in light or fan. Quiet and great air flow. Was going to use 2 smaller fans but getting great compliments from return weekly renters.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Amazing Fan, don't get the negative reviews"
Review_Text: We have owned this fan over 18 months now, and it is super quite (from day 1 to today). Oh, and we have run it 24/7 on first setting (changing direction for the seasons). If we get hot, we bump it up to 3. If we want to stir the dust bunnies and blow the papers off the table we turn it up to 6. We have a modest house, with a large great room. Searched for about 45 days for the perfect fan to fit the room size. Most fans that met this requirement were $650+. Enter the quite beast. At less than half the price of what we considered it's competition it was pretty easy to make our decision, and we have loved it ever since. It has not only served us faithfully, but it is also a conversation piece at family gatherings. Highly recommended. Hope this helps you in your purchase decision.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Ceiling fan looks great on our covered patio, having the remote makes it very easy to use.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: These fans are very neat looking and built with quality parts. Controls are operated with a remote ONLY. The only problem I had when the fans are close enough to get a signal is setting up the remotes to work on each fan individually when doing the initial setup. If you want to control each fan individually, it must be done within the first 60 secs of power being turned on, and signal needs to be blocked from other fans, or it will program 2 fans at a time. I used a metal electrical box that the remote fit inside of and held it directly under the fan to set it. This blocked the signal from going to the other fans.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: A decent looking fan that actually does work. I had a couple of 56” Ceiling fans from Sam's club that barely pushed any air. I probably didn't have to upgrade to this 72” model to improve on that but so glad I did.It was fairly easy to install, just a tad bit heavier than the previous fan but pushes probably 10 times the air. The light is very bright too, but I worry about when the led fixture goes bad. So far so good. Reverse is on the remote, which is a good thing and 6 speed! Being a brushless DC motor, it's very quiet and efficient. Will order one more for the living room.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We had the Slinger version 1 fan and it finally crapped out on us after 6 years and so we bought the Slinger version 2. Sharp looking, easy to use, and moves a significant amount of air.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is amazing-quiet and very beautiful. We put it in our great room- 20' ceiling. We had to rent a scaffolding to stall it. Found receiver that came with fan was defective. Called company, they sent new one, FedExed it overnight and paid for extra day rental on scaffolding. They standTheir product. They are very customer focused. I would buy again.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I own four and they work great with no issues. I had Lamps Plus install them which included ie if anyrbinf should go wrong or stop working. Thwy will come and take it down and replace it at no charge. I noticed alot of people complaining that the fan is not that great. Alot of people install fans that are too small for the room. So before before you install the fan. Make sure it is the right side. Also some people love to complain and if i read all the negative reviews. I would never buy anything.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: While reading through the reviews of this fan I've noticed ( 2) complaints. #1: The color of the blades. "Which the blades are "not" metal and are "not" chrome! They are more of a greenish tan. this surprised me too. however upon installation they appear to be chrome again. I believe the manufacturer made them this way on purpose due to light reflection reactions. "The way the blades are positioned they completely appear to be chrome when installed". It's hanging on my ceiling right now and I, nor my " color specialist/interior designer" wife are able to tell a difference. The other thing people are complaining about is that the fan stops working out of nowhere. In my opinion this is most likely due to the fan not being wired properly and because of the faulty wiring the motor ends up burning out. Its best to have a licensed electrician wire the fan. But remember"just because you hire someone to do it doesn't mean that they actually know how to correctly install it". ive seen many inexperienced people claim they do this for a living and wind up doing more damage than good. Now people can successfully wire the fan to work all day but that doesn't mean that it was wired correctly. Which in turn could end up burning up the motor. That's why I say that a licensed electrician would be your best bet depending on the type of switches you have in your home. If the fan suddenly stops working first revaluate the wiring of the fan. after looking at the wiring then we can claim defect. now from time to time the product being defective is to blame. That being said, usually if the product was defective it would not have preformed at all from the beginning. I'm not saying that it doesn't happen but more than likely the wiring of the fan is to blame. I've included a picture of the manual describing what will happen if the fan is not wired correctly. I would also like to add that this fan comes with a limited lifetime warranty on fan defects and workmanship. If it hasn't been that long since you purchased it then return or trade out the fan with proof of purchase, and have someone else install the new one. if it has been a while since purchase I would recommend calling the 1800 number that is on the image that I posted. if you live around my area then I'll be more than happy to help you install it properly and without worries "luxury4less"

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Easily one of the easiest I have ever installed regardless of size. The DC motor is a dream and this thing moves a TON of air. It is virtually silent, the remote is simple to pair, and it look the business. Only issue which may seem negative is not being able to use a wall switch to control it.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We had to replace the fan in our great room and decided to go with the larger ( more blades and greater diameter) fan. Size DOES matter and I wish I had realized it years ago. Our great room is much more comfortable.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Works well to cool our large game room, which gets very hot! Easy installation. We would definitely recommend this fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Absolutely love it! Moves a ton of air. Remote control is great. I'm going to buy another for the master bedroom.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Terrific product! Very well built , easy assembly, looks and moves the air perfectly in my large living room.Buy with confidence!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: This in fact is my favorite ceiling fan I have ever owned. Easy to install, very nice looking and it keeps my large room very cool even in the Las Vegas heat. It is very smooth and quite and the remote control works no matter where I'm at in the room. I would highly recommend this product as my son has one and recommend it to me.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We just installed this fan in our great room and it works like a charm! The remote was easy to understand. In just a few days, we've gotten several compliments about the look. It was a great deal.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I have never seen a fan that was built as good as this fan. When you put it together every part is so solid and tightens up so good compared to other fans. Then when I turned it on was so AMAZED how quiet and smooth the fan was. 100% recomend this fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan. 9 blades moves lots of air 6 speeds gives you control of how much air to move. Remote control and LED lighting are pluses.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: This van is absolutely incredible. We have a large living room with a vaulted ceiling. The six speed option makes it very easy to control the airspeed you want. Definitely would recommend this fan to anyone who wants air motion.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan that is extremely well built. Loved the first one so much I bought another one.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I really like the quality of this fan and what is amazing is how quiet it is .

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We upgraded from a 60” to this beautiful 72” ceiling fan and I have to say that it's like having 20 bald eagles flying over our head with a remote control at our leisure. Install was simple but I chose to install all fan blades but two to make it easier, and it was. We get nothing but compliments on this fan and keep it on level 3 for the perfect air movement. It has 6 levels of raw power but we prefer not to wear our ski diving attire while watching tv (just not comfy like shorts and a tee-shirt are). To sum up excellence... modern, perfect air movement, dimable LED's, bright lighting, and the opportunity to brag about it every chance we get.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is a hit with everyone that sees it! It circulates a LOT of air! The remote is simple to operate. It does come with a lot of pieces to assemble, but worth the extra time!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We recently bought our third copy of this fan. We have each color and love them all. It's a great design, looks good stopped or moving. The motor is dead quiet and the remote gives plenty of speed and control options.I'd like the light to be a slightly warmer color, but this fan is a great value!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We purchased the Slinger by fanimation in silver for another room and loved it. Then found it came in matte black online. Again super happy with the fan. Have already ordered a second matte black.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Great on our covered deck even in high humidity"
Review_Text: Bought this fan for our covered deck because of the high cfm, we were not disappointed, it exceeded our expectations. Even when the humidity is ridiculously high you can still feel a breeze. If the humidity isn't as high, we are able to use the lower speeds and still be comfortable. We bought 3 of them, they look great. Have had them in for over a year. Keeps the mosquitoes away as an added bonus.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We absolutely love this fan! We replaced an old one and also brought it down another 2 feet. The fan has 6 speeds and they create quite an airflow! The LED light is pretty bright with no dimming. We'll probably use the fan mostly with the light off.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Picked the fan for the bedroom. Excellent choice easy to install.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is excellent. We have this installed in our great room with 20ft ceilings. We were skeptical of the amount of light, but this allows for sufficient lighting while accent lighting is placed around the room. This fan pushes a LOT of air. The 6-speed setting allows for optimal settings as well as the dimming light. We had this unit installed by a licensed contractor, but opted not to use Lowe's for installation. The sales rep we spoke with recommended we use Lowe's for installation, but this would require a $40 fee (applicable to installation cost) just to get a quote for installation cost.The fan is quite large and very heavy if you attempt to install by yourself.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Has a modern and industrial look. Looks and operates great.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Ive has this fan for about a year not. Not impressed at all. The light is not very bright at all, the remote sucks and its slow. I can stand directly below it next to it and push the off button 50 times and it will not turn off. The light is not very bright at all and for a fan this size it is not even fast. I've had smaller fans that push more air than this one. I thought I bought the best one boy was I wrong. Already looking for a replacement

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Canceled order after realizing fan can only be used with remote. Wanted hardwired.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I have it indoor, on my living room. I had it 8 months now. It work when it wants to.. sometimes you turn it on and it start spinning to the other side and then it changes by it self.. $300 for a crap quality fan. And it says it can be outdoor.. yeah right.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We usually have 2 smaller fans under our 10 x 20 ft deck so decided to get one 72in instead so we got this one. Yes its huge, has a remote control w 6 as highest setting and 6 is not very fast and u have to sit directly under to even feel some air. My deck is only 8 ft high. So big is not always best. Would NOT recommend this fan!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I'm just dispointed on the air flow,thats why it gets a one star.The fan looks nice. I was hoping the blades was real stainless steel metal,disappointing its plastic..but over all it looks beautiful..

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is fantastic, if it works. Had it for 15 months. Its stopped working and I cant get it to come back on. Reading the warranty, its for a year, and after that you are on your own. This fan is in my bedroom, so its going to be a delight to replace it with a new one. Ive seen a lot of reviews from people saying they get a little over a year out of the fan. So, if thats what you are looking for, great.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Looks Great...may not be best for porch/lanai"
Review_Text: I bought 2 of these fans. One for inside and one for outside. I put a 12" downrod instead of the 6" that it came with. Inside I have an 18x20 room with a 10' ceiling. This thing works great. Even on #1 it moves air. On #6 it blows us away. We rarely put it above #3.Outside it was a waste of money. Same 10' ceiling but in the open lanai I don't even feel the air on #6. It looks nice though.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great looking fan. The grey fan blades look a little cheap when fan is off. Don't notice them when it's moving.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Had electrician install it. Loved it for 14 mo, then it died. I am talking to the 1/888 # and they say I need a new receiver. Warranty was just 12 mo for the receiver.They where very nice over the phone and tried to help me trouble shoot and re- set the remote.Notthing worked so the reciever is $50.00/. Ill be happy if it works? Stay tuned?

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Get the longer downrod for higher ceilings"
Review_Text: This is a nice and inexpensive fan for those who are looking for a larger diameter ceiling fan. I installed ours on our pool deck which has a 12 foot ceiling. I was disappointed in the amount of airflow the fan generated. Even at the highest setting the airflow was mediocre. However, I decided that I would try an 18 inch downrod instead of the included 6 inch downrod and found that the airflow is fantastic with a longer downrod. Perhaps for a lower ceiling the included downrod would work alright, but for higher ceilings I think you need to spend a little bit of extra money on the longer downrod ($25-35). I was able to find Fanimation downrods on eBay and through Lowes.com — special order. The fan is perfectly balanced and required no adjustment. The remote works well enough, although the motor control isn't instantaneous and sometimes requires a second or two to get going. All told, I'm very pleased with this purchase and would certainly buy it again.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Love the fan. Very quiet. Extremely smooth. Moves lots of air even at low speeds. It is remote controlled and the light is built into the fan, which keeps it from getting the highest rating.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought two for an outdoor patio. Looks....5 star, but these were bought to move air and they do a horrible job of that. Definitely not 9k cfpm. They moved less air than a cheap ceiling fan did that was a placeholder until these came in.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Review title just about says it all & not something I would expect from a $300 fan. Checked power & connections & all good, so guessing it's the remote receiver. Fan really works well but extremely disappointing that I will now have to deal with what's likley a few weeks of working with Fanimation customer service. And did I mention I live in Central FL where the air does not move this time of year & this is my covered patio fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: "NO Install Instructions." Looks great. Airflow feels just like my old 52-in fan. I don't think its moving 8210-CFM of airflow.. DC motor, nice remote, the light works great. Would I buy again. "NO I wouldn't.."I'm I going to return it. "No, my wife likes the look of the fan."

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: It wobbles and the balancing kit does not resolve it. It is very frustrating to pay this much for a fan, spend the time installing it, then have to spend more time trying to get a wobble out, then have to take it down, repack it and return it.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Called the factory and followed the book instructions and there's. Remote no pull chains yes. Have 2 if they had pull chains would by 5 more. Fans have a mind of there own

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor/Outdoor Commercial/Residential Ceiling Fan with Light Kit Included and Remote Control Included (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "looks really nice, but doesn't move air down"
Review_Text: the light is nice, the fan looks nice, however it doesn't push the air down. Yes I mounted the blades correctly, yes it's turning in the right direction. It's just that the blades move air away from the center of the fan so if you sit of to the side, you get some airflow, just not right below the fan. Since this fan is 6 feet wide it's a big area that does not get airflow. I will be returning this. In a smaller room it might work well since the walls will deflect the airflow and make it circulate throughout the room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Laralyn 32-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (4-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice looking unit. Super quiet fan operation. Using for bedroom @100 square foot. Lighting is adequate. Buy stronger LED bulbs if necessary. Only downside is fan blade assembly, be patient..., .

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Laralyn 32-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (4-Blade)
Review_Text: I needed a smaller fan for my kitchen. This one is perfect.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Laralyn 32-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (4-Blade)
Review_Text: Was looking for a small fan & light for a nook area. Found this one and it works great for the small area it was intended. Looks great and easy install. Didn't use down rod because of 8' ceiling. Perfect!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Laralyn 32-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (4-Blade)
Review_Text: Put this fan in my new tiny living room (8x12) and it is perfect! Plus, it REALLY moves a LOT of air in the highest setting. We love it, and are going to get another for the bedroom.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Laralyn 32-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (4-Blade)
Review_Header: "Liked it so much, bought another one"
Review_Text: Was looking to replace our outdated ceiling fan and wanted something smaller that fit our home decor. This fit the bill, and so much we bought another one for the bedroom. Soft lighting and reversible color blades to fit ant style. Non intrusive size but gets the job done.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection RingAire 23-in Chrome LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Looks very hi-tech and nice for contemporary homes. The light in rim shape adds to the look. Fits very well in my bar area.To feel the air, you have to sit under the fan. However, coolness spreads given sometime.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection RingAire 23-in Chrome LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This was an easy to install and unique looking fan. Light over kitchen table is perfect, fan quiet. Love it.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection RingAire 23-in Chrome LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Beautiful fan and light combo. It looks elegant and provides much circulation in our office.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "If you are getting paid to install charge double"
Review_Text: Installed a large amount of fans in my 22years if being an electrician. This is the worst one by farYou take the actual fan motor cover apart on the ground to install the blades and install the fan with the blades on up the ladder. Terrible engineering, do yourself a favor and take this back and pick another one.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I am writing the review as i am looking up warranty info. LIke other bad reviews mine is no exception. I have had it about a year. Instalation was a bit difficult and time consuming but the directions were pretty good. Disapointed to find out you can only control the fan and lights by remote and not with seperate wall switches. Light is not as bright as we were looking for even on high setting. After a fee months started to here a clicking noise from the motor which is now worse and will replace the fan. Looks good but too loud for a bed room.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan is very quiet. Wish the light was a little brighter.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: bought this last year but didnt get it installed until today..good buddy installed it in a couple hours.. the newer design and the fact that it's mainly controlled with the remote were the main reasons I bought it.. the led is dimmable going from almost dark to extremely bright. three fan speeds are enough and moves air nicely.. there's also 3 different timer settings on the remote..all in all I'm happy..so far so good..

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Love this fan. Purchase two for our big kitchen. Installation was a little awkward per installer due to the blades but once he got one up the second one was a breeze. It looks good and works great. Very quiet even on the high mode and love the option of being able to dim the lights if needed too.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: What a great looking fan. I installed with a 12" down rod and the fan is perfectly balanced with no wobbling. The fan is super quiet, even on the fastest setting. The installation process was ok, there were a few extra steps compared to a more basic fan installation but it was still easy.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Ordered another one because we loved the first"
Review_Text: We now have two fans of this kind because we loved the first one so much. Installed one in our master bedroom and one in the guest bedroom. Install was moderately difficult..but the fan works amazing and is fully worth it. So sleek and modern looking. We might be getting another one for the study in the future :-)

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Beautiful fan that looks so great that I bought two more!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Have it for 2 weeks. First time installing a fan myself, instructions were super easy to follow. Respond very quickly to remote. Operates really well.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easily installed and easy to operate with remote control! What's not to like?

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan has a great look up, functions well with variable speed and light intensity, and the remote makes it great to have. A very satisfied customer.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It's a pretty light- simple and modern- quiet motor- Dan works super well. I'm really happy with this fan. Electrician did say that it was tricky to install....

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Looks and works great. Very quite and the LED light is very bright.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Like the previous reviewer stated, the fan blades have to go on before you can hang the fan which makes it a little cumbersome. You are also going to need the shortest Phillips-head you can find and a lot of patience. There's a mount cover that you will attach last and it's in a pretty bad angle. This is the least installation-friendly fan I have ever done and I would absolutely suggest paying for the installation.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan, now that it is up, seems to be OK. However, installation is a mess. As mentioned in several reviews the blades being installed before the wiring and motor are in place certainly makes wiring connections, screw removal, etc. unnecessarily awkward. Loved the oversimplified picture (sic) of the remote sitting comfortably in the hanger bracket! Might be that neat and easy if it weren't for 6 wire connections having to be routed in and around the same space. Finally it might be easier to take out one screw and loosen the other in the shoulder of the hanger bracket before you get the canopy hanging in your way. If not, you'd better have a offset screw driver or a stubby.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I like the design and look of the fan. The assembly process was easy, no issues with easy to follow instructions. The parts were clearly marked, no damage to any of them and everything was present. The fan leans toward a little modern and the ends of the fan blades are covered by the housing. A nice look. The LED lights are bright and dimmable. The remote is small and easy to use and you can control all functions with the remote, to include dimming the light. The fan is overall quiet, just the noise from the blades moving the air. No chains hanging down, a nice clean look. The fan is balanced and I didn't need to use the balancing kit. SO far so good, I hope it lasts. Overall, a nice fan and not overly expensive. It goes well with our walnut bedroom set and brushed nickel hardware throughout the house.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: You need a PhD to follow the instructions, items not in chronological order and items missed. Having to put blades on before hanging makes it awkward, to say the least, to get to screws and attach wires from above your head and around the blades. Allow extra time to assemble and install. Installing receiver very tricky - not a lot of room to stay clear of wiring. Having said that, the end result is great. Difficult to stop the “woobling” - just find some patience having spent 2 hours installing to that point. Light is bright and dimmable, remote responsive and simple. Motor runs quiet. For the price it's well worth it and very good looking.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice looking fan assembly. Pretty easy to install.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan actually looks nice - which is the deciding factor to buy. Sadly it makes clicking noises when operating. It has been removed and checked for loose screws and moving parts - turns out it's in the motor assembly part - you can spin the motor, with everything else removed and hear the noises. I wish I had kept the receipt and box.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan is standard instillation. It is nice looking fits the room I have it installed in perfect. The fan is fine on the lower two speeds the third speed the wind noise is bothersome please realize not a very large room. I would agree that the light is not real bright but for my purpose it will be fine. Really what I dislike most is that the only way to control this fan is with the remote No chains exterior controls it is just the remote. Not too crazy about this and would have bought another fan if I had realized. As I do not have children and I have no intention of renting this home out I think I will be alright.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We bought this fan 10 months ago and it's still great. I installed it fairly easily with no help and zero experience. Nothing has come loose, no wobbling, and no noise at all. The light is pretty dim, but it's only in our bedroom. The air flow is great. I have the fan and light wired to separate switches and everything works just fine. You do need the remote to change speeds, but I understood that from reading the box when I bought it. I blame poor installation or defective products for most of the bad reviews.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Remote controlled comfort and no broken pull chains!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan installed very easy and came with a remote too. It is very quiet and does not wobble at all.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I installed this fan a little over a year ago. It moves air with ease and NO NOISE..

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We had the same experience as Marko, with the Bayou Creek fan. After a careful installation in our Master Bedroom we ended up with an annoying “hum, hum, hum” even in low speed. Way too annoying for our liking— couldn't run the fan while sleeping because of the noise. Took it back and bought another hoping we had just gotten a lemon but got the same result. Too bad, liked how it looked and it was fairly inexpensive.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I love the color of fan blades. Looks great in my living room. Love that it comes with a remote!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Bayou Creek 56-in Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It works very well on hot summer Big Tdays the high speed downdraft is amazing. The lighting is a bit dim,but I like that.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Maybe ours is defective but ours too wiggles and wobbles at random it seems and even on full blast we barely feel the air movement ( tried switching between sun and snowflake on remote ) I have had many fans much smaller in similar sized rooms and they all were way more powerful and easier to balance then this fan ... it's been installed for a while so not sure we can do anything now other than just wait to buy another

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Finished a new house in October of 2017. We picked these fans, because of their size, for a large open living/ kitchen. The Ceiling has a vault (5.5/12) which brings the peak to 15'-6". They looked great and filled the space appropriately. They do move a lot of air but that is where the perks end. As others have mentioned, the globe does not seat well. There is basically a locking groove in the globe which rotates around an extruded bump in the fan. It is next to impossible to tell if the globe "locked" into place. At just over a year the first light kit quit. I tried to figure it out but realized the components are internal to the fan. At least we still had one light kit. I changed the bulbs in that light to LED to get more light from the single fan. I didn't make it another two months or so and that light quit as well. Now I have large fans in the living room but no light. Disappointing. Also, as others have mentioned, the remote does not always work well. I was running two fans from the same remote. Sometimes the remote and the fan wont "talk". In those cases you have one fan on, one fan off and you have to play a game to try to get them to operate at the same capacity. The same was the case with the light kit when they were working. One light would turn on, the other would not. So you had to try and block the beam with your body or a wall to only allow one light to function. Still rarely worked and would turn into a process to get the lights both on or both off. Potentially the most aggravating thing is the electronics are not easily accessible. I would have just changed the internals to get my light kits back on. However, I have to drop the fans to make that happen, from a 15'-6" vaulted ceiling. Most other fans the electronics are accessible if you drop the light kit.... not these. I have to demount a 70" fan. This leaves me to believe I just have to buy a couple more fans. Lowes is limited on their selection of large (70") fans with remotes so I have to head to the competition. I have little faith these fans would function if I bought new ones, and honestly, I really do not want to be out another $500 in less than two years for non-functional fans. Recap - The Good:* Decent Look* Large Fan, Moves a lot of air* Fills Large Spaces* Remote Control Function (perfect for high ceilings where you cannot reach a chain)* Fans were pretty much balanced out of the box and limited to no wobbleThe Bad:* Horrible design for globe. Literally could fall off at any time* Two light kits quit in around 1.5 years of operation, just months apart* Remote control is non-consistent. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. This could be a problem if you have two fans in the same room* Not previously mentioned but the fans have a tendency to turn backward about a full turn before reversing into the correct direction. This is a bit annoying but with the torqueing it concerns me about causing vibration and the globes loosening enough to fallThe Takeaway - If you don't need a 70" fan look at other options. These fans look like a good deal but are actually a waste of money and are risky in hard to reach places. $500 worth of fans were gone in just over 1.5 years, not worth the hassle and definitely not worth the money. Look for other options!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: good fan. best fan in the house.-review by my 8 year old son who knows A LOT about fans and knows about many makes and models of fans

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Beautiful. Easy install. Works with every remote command. Perfect finish for our room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I almost didn't buy this fan due to the awful reviews and the size! BUT I'm so glad I did! This fan is gorgeous! My dad and husband installed easily in about an hour. It's nearly SILENT on the highest speed. It makes our great room look amazing. We love that you're able to mount the remote on the wall. I can not say enough good things about this fan! Don't let the reviews scare you!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: great fan, nice clean look. extra long blades . remote control .does not have to be installed on a long rod and ball end. made to be installed close to ceiling if that is what you want to do.does not have led lights which is a negative. lighting is not very bright.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy to install, and all functions as advertised. Simple to use after a little instruction.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: As a 70-inch fan, you'll of course get amazing circulation, and this one does not disappoint, even at it's lowest setting, provides great circulation. It is stylish and very well designed for a rustic look, with great lighting. 2 huge pluses to this fan: First, the remote control wiring unit is pre-built into the housing, so just connect three wires to your supply wiring, hang and your done. Second: this fan doesn't make a peep! It is quite as can be. Love this fan!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I out in 20 foot in the air I was very pleased that the instructions were easy to follow and it when together nicely

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The ceiling fan was easy to install and works great. Would definitely recommend.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We love this fan, it is beautiful! The only downfall is the light is not as bright as I would like for it to be. Fairly easy to install.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is a good design and works well except it wobbles.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The remote malfunctions all of the time. I am literally trying to go to sleep with the light on right now because the remote is not working and I cannot get the light to turn off. This is not the first time this has happened.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Im licensed electrician for 24 years, I've installed over a thousand ceiling fans during my career. This fan is one of the better fans to assemble, and looks good. Unfortunately the two Ive installed for my customer are impossible to get stop wobbling at 5&6 speed. They barley put out any air at the top setting.The fans were set surface mount, I use a torque setting on tool to verify consistency on all parts installed. Followed troubleshooting guide with manual, and balancing kit instructions. 20-30 min. install, and hour troubleshooting. Contacted tech support and informed them of issue and that I followed owners manual. She instructed me to have the customer return them, and purchase something new, no other solutions. 3 hrs of labor with nothing done. Customer is going to return fans and call me back when she has selected her new ceiling fans. It will not be a Harbor Breeze fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought this fan today but will be taking it back tomorrow. Got it installed but it wobbles real bad, have tried everything the manual said to do but hasn't helped. If not that can't control fan or light with remote. Sometimes it works but most of time it doesn't. I should have bought the one I went after but did like the looks of this one but just didn't know it wouldn't be all that.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased this fan and did not read the past reviews like I should have. After installing it, it just wobbles and wobbles. I have tried everything to fix it but nothing works. It is going back to the store for a full refund tomorrow. I am so frustrated. Do not waste your money!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Unfortunately I bought this fan prior to reading the reviews. It actually looks pretty nice and installed fairly easily. My issue is that when I turned it on for the first time it wobbles so badly I thought it was going to detach itself from the ceiling. I did go through the reviews afterwards and see I'm not the only one with a wobbly fan. I read the responses from the manufacturer on how to fix it. I tried them all and nothing helped. Blades are on tight, the ceiling box is tight (this replaced an old fan the did not wobble, so I knew it wouldn't be the box), tried the included balancing kit - nothing worked. My other issue is the remote. When you press a button the fan is slow to respond. Seems like it takes a couple of seconds from the time you press the button to when the fan starts to move. Not only that, but the fan actually starts to spin in the opposite direction on what I have it set for. Say I have it set to rotate clockwise - when I press the remote button to turn it on, the fan will slowly start to spin conterclockwise for about half a rotation, slowly come to a stop, then slowly start spinning clockwise. This happened several times regardless of the rotation I had selected. Anyway, took it down and boxed it back up to return. That was an afternoon wasted.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Kingsbury 70-in Oil-Rubbed Bronze Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: While the fan itself is great for a large room, the main downside to this fan is it has to be controlled by a remote. It is also impossible to hook the light kit up to a switch for when you walk into a room. Everything is controlled by the remote. While this make it look better than having chains hang down, it does make it less convenient.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easiest installation ever!Will always use Hunter brand from now on!No confusing instructions or ridiculous remotes to install or keep track of, simply operate with wall switches and or pull chains!

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I absolutely loved be this fan!!!! I couldn't be happier with it. My neighbor saw it and asked for the model to purchase it himself!

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Well balance and quiet. Good instructions, easy to install. Makes the kitchen much cooler.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We are doing a whole home remodel and I purchased this to go in our living room. It looks amazing with our rustic décor. It was easy to install and only took about 30 mins. I'm very pleased with how it looks and works. It's very quite and believe it or not, It's also very bright!!

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Love the decor of this fan fits the 1950s house it's in

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased this fan to replace one that was not working. The fan was easy to install. The fan is very quiet and gave my room the look I was going for.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy to install and looks good. Quality fan.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Attractive, quality fan, but lights are weak."
Review_Text: Purchased this fan for my living room. Install was straight forward. Runs very quietly. Required no external balancing. Doesn't seem to move as much air as my old fan though.Definitely disappointed in the light fixture. While attractive, it ships with three 3.5 watt lamps, which are about a 25 watt equivalent. Not nearly enough light for general area lighting of a "large room" as specified. I would have expected at least a 40 watt equivalent. Nowhere on the packaging does it list the lamp output, so I had no way of knowing until after I installed it.Purchasing higher output lamps is not a simple solution. The jar-type globes that fit over the lamps only allow for relatively small lamps. That severely limits the options. No place I've found thusfar actually sells bulbs the same shape as those it comes with either. You're pretty much stuck with a candelabra shaped lamp for replacement.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Good quality, easy instructions, quite operation, and what you would expect to pay for this quality fan.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan was installed in my son's room, it didn't take but an hour overall to install it myself, and I am not exactly an electrician either. Good airflow, and quiet operation.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: Absolutely stunning fan. Is is so stylish yet is totally quiet while moving a lot of air, but not in way that makes your hair blow, it's just comfortable. I find the remote control to be quite simple to use & functional in it's use. The dimmable LED light is very flexible, going from a comfortable on the eye dim, to a read a book high. This is one exceptional & surprisingly affordable fan that I wouldn't hesitate a minute to buy again.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: This ceiling fan is smooth and quiet. The quality and engineering is excellent. Installed this fan in my bedroom because prior AC motor with brushes was keeping my wife and myself awake at night. After installing this one I have ordered two more for other rooms in my house.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: Looks great in our living room and was an easy install. Only negative is the remote, it takes a few seconds after you press a button for the fan to react. Super quiet though and moves alot of our. Would definitely recommend!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan is an updated style and works great. We love it for our patio. You can use it with our without the light. We chose to not put the light up so it fades into the color of the ceiling.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy to install and very quite. Just got both of them up and work as designed. Have not had them long enough to see how well they will do in the summer heat and humidity on by patio but they look great and they do move a lot of air especially on high. The light kit is simple to install and puts out a lot of light.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Header: "Light dimmer didn't work then fan going return"
Review_Text: I put this up and dimmer didn't work, the company said they send me me new lights and remote. But then the fan turned off middle night then couldn't get to go to high speed,so just turned off then turned on morning the fan worked. The fan also has been sluggish coming on kinda aggravating to pay so much for a fan and have problems right out of box.also if you need replacement motor later on you have to ship it to them your expense.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Blitz 56-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (7-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan has great style and is very functional. Love the look of it!

Product_Name: Kichler Clermont 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: so smooth and beautiful. I would recommend to purchase.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan is great. Remote included. I put it above my dinette table. I am going to take it down and put it in a bedroom. The led light is only 600 lumens. I wish I had read the box before I purchased. This light has less than a 50 watt bulb.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I like the clean look of the unit. Everything is operating ok since installation about 6 months ago. My only complaint is how loud the fan motor is. The faster the speed the louder the hum from the motor.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Very disappointed in this approx two year old fan/light! Yes, it is very pretty but that's where it ends. The light started turning off and on and is now completely done! So, if you like the look of a very pretty fan with a useless light feature, go for it. I'm going for a Hunter's fan/light like I should have in the first place

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: My son broke one of the blades off of this fan, so I'm thinking, no big deal, I'll call the company and get a new blade sent out. I call them and they say "We can only sell new blades to you in a pack of 3." I figure ok, that's dumb but whatever. They tell me it's going to cost something like $15, and then another $15 for shipping, so $30 total, so at that point I'm annoyed it's going to cost so much (1/4 of the total fan cost just because I need to replace one blade) but heck I need to get it fixed so I'm ready to pay the $30. Then they say "We don't have it in stock, you'll need to call back in 6-8 weeks and we should have it in stock and can sell to you." Now I'm thinking, ok this has got to be the worst customer service I've ever heard of. I double check that they're serious and there's no other way to get it, put it in my calendar to call in another 6 weeks, and wait. 6 weeks roll around, I call, and again I'm told "We don't have them in stock, you missed it and will need to try calling more frequently since it's done on a first come first serve basis and we don't put your name on a list or anything like that." So now I guess I'll call once a week hoping to miraculously call when they get a delivery in, so I have the privilege of paying $30 to be able to use my fan again. WILL NEVER BUY THIS BRAND AGAIN.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Remote stopped working. Changed the battery. Battery works for one day. Went to Lowes to buy a two pack of A23 batteries. Change the battery again. Same problem. Problem is not due to the remote losing the connection, although I've cut the power in the house to attempt to reset -- not the issue, light doesn't come on. Now on battery #3; we'll see what happens tomorrow. There's no way to turn the fan or the light on manually. Not wired to a switch (will never do that again).First time in 40 years to have a problem with a ceiling fan. Would never buy this model again.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "No replacement lights & the do burn out quick"
Review_Text: Purchased fan, less than 6 months later the LED lights that "do not need replacing" stopped working. I went into the store, they ordered replacement parts and sent me on my way. Contacted Harbor Breeze directly 2 weeks later and was told that the part is on back order and it could be 30-90 days. I asked the customer service rep what I am supposed to do without a light in my bedroom? I can't buy a replacement light and this fan was brand new. She basically hung up on me.. transferred me to an "auto feedback system" that stated they were no longer taking surveys for that location and disconnect.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I am very happy with the "Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brush Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-blade)" from the detailed step by step installation instructions to the quiet operation of the ceiling fan. The center light is surprisingly bright and the controller adjusts the speed of the fan and the brightness of the light. I intend to purchase other Harbor Breeze ceiling fans in the future. I believe the price of the fan justifies the quality of the ceiling fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This is a fan that works very well in small rooms. Setup was very easy, the hardest part was getting the blades lined up to be secured into place. The light is part of the fan, and shouldn't ever need replacing according to the box. The only draw back is that you need to have the remote in order to change the fan speed. Otherwise, it's a solid fan, easiest one i've had to install yet.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Purchased partially because liked the idea of three blades (less to clean) and not needed for a large room. It is a very nice, easy to install fan. You can dim it from the remote, not as bright as our regular LED lights but not needed to be very bright. Would recommend.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased 1 LAST YEAR AND INTEND TO PURCHASE 2 MORE THIS YEAR THEY ARE VERY QUIET AND LOOK GREAT. I ONLY WISH THEY CAME IN WHITE FINISH.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I love the remote control/dimmer. Really love the fact the remote has a base which can be secured with screws. I installed the remote holder next to the switch that controls the fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: We returned it because it was too big for the area we wanted to install it in.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I've installed at least 3,000 ceiling fans since 1976. This is a very simple fan to install. You must make sure the existing electrical box, is level, or the fan base won't be flush when done. I have had around 5 of these fans that make a hum. Richard Piselli electric in San Diego approves this message.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: We purchased two of these fans for our garage and they are perfect size and they blend perfect with our garage. And on sale makes it even better.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Loved this fan so much we have 2! First one bought over a year ago, good working fan, puts out good airflow!!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan is so quiet and fits perfectly for our bedroom!! Highly recommend and is cool to the eye.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: The light is very bright but has dinner for desired brightness, easy to install and very quite.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is a nice change to a more contemporary look. I do wish the light were brighter. It's not much use as and overhead light. So far, the fan, although smaller than my other ones, seems to create enough breeze. The remotes are great, of course. I bought four fans. I'll write another review if things change. I haven't really lived with the fans yet as they are part of a remodel due to a fire.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Great product. Very easy to install. Only problem is I have 3 in my house but still have trouble programming the remote. Put one on and 2 go on. SMH

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy install. Great output. Adds beautiful look to the room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Installed this in my 5-yo son's bedroom, and it wasn't until summer kicked into high gear I noticed very audible motor hum, regardless of how much I tighten or attempt to rebalance blades. The hum kicks on as soon as power is supplied to the unit, even before the blades get enough speed to potentially be the cause of the noise- so 100% it's the motor, not installation error. Runs nearly silent on power-1, but power-2 and 3 are both loud and would drive me nuts if I was trying to fall asleep in the room. Fortunately, my son doesn't complain yet as he sleeps with a white noise machine but not a purchase I would make again and can't return.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Mazon 44-in Brushed Nickel Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Fan looks great, light is VERY dim"
Review_Text: The fan looks and works well for our Master Bedroom. However, the light is very dim.
