We have 2 additional lamps in the room which have to be on the same time as this to provide adequate light to the room. The light kit does not use light bulbs so you cannot just add brighter bulbs. I am trying to find a replacement disk but am not having any luck.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Product as promised in description. Works very quietly.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought mine in Nov 2016 and stained the blades to match décor. So quiet and keeps you cool with the 6 speeds on the remote control that I removed my window A/C bedroom unit. Would highly recommend it. Easy to install for the average person. Well balanced, no wabble.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Amazing quality and looks great! We put four in our restaurant/bar.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Great Fans, pay attention to the Installation Tips"
Review_Text: I was looking for modern fans to replace the standard "Hunters" from the 1990s and a google search turned me on to these great fans. I first saw them in Matte finish but our floors are plain oak and the Brushed Nickel with plain oak looking blades were a perfect match. Fans are working great and we're really pleased with the airflow. I paid attention to the "3 plastic bushings w/screws removal/discard" note in the reviews but failed to read the even more important,"hang the motor with the blades installed" tip. THAT ONE IS THE MOST IMPORTANT!!!! We actually got the screws in while the motors were hanging but only after my wife cut plastic straws to stick in the screw holes to guide the fan blades. Way too hard. Put the blades on first! Also, the review that recommended staining the blades was also helpful as we're going to buy a third fan and put it in our bedroom after we stain it cherry to match our furniture.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Almost a year later...Works great in my garage."
Review_Text: I installed this fan toward the back of my garage. 30x20x8. There's about a second, almost 2 delay when you first turn it on. Speeds are perfect for me. I've left this fan running for a weekend, no issues. It moves air, however, two fans would work better based on where its located. Love the look, and holding up nicely despite the humidity we experience in Jersey. My only drawback is that I sacrificed a ceiling light and have found it to be an issue. I'm moving this fan indoors and have a better suited room with a high ceiling and floor lamps. I would have two in my garage if I had better lighting. Need to replace it with one that has a lighting kit.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "We've had these fans for about 2 years. Love them!"
Review_Text: We bought these fans to go with a beach-feel decor and they were - and are still - perfect. They are stylish, put out a good amount of air, and are one of my favorite things about our living/dining room.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Although we bought the grey fan on clearance, we intend to change the colors to match our decor. We love the look and expect it to work perfectly!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Love this fan. Being an aviator, I like the look. It comes with a 6 speed remote and the fan is absolutely quiet. The remote even has a reverse direction button for the winter!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Looks awesome but better with a darker stain!"
Review_Text: Really nice looking wood as in but stained it darker to match our other wood. Really quite but weird startup procedure

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Great looking fan but can't use with wall switches"
Review_Text: You had to dig into the specs to determine this fan is driven by a DC motor. Even then, a typical consumer will not know that this means you can't use a wall switch that lets you adjust between high, medium, and low. I learned the hard way, after it was installed. You must rely on the remote that comes with it. Who wants an extra remote sitting around.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Prop 60-in Matte Gray Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This is indeed a beautiful design. However we purchased two from Lowe's and both have failed. I wish it were nor so - as the wood blades match our wood floors so nicely. But I simply can't recommend this product.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice design, high quality. Love this fam we got for our living room.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Although not a real wood design, you cant tell the difference. The LED light fixture is perfect. I really like this product. I installed it myself and really liked the spaciousness of the final cover for the wire connections. The receptacle box was shallow leaving very little space to put the rigid housing wire connections, but because of the fan housing structure I didn't have to worry so much about that. It was probably the easiest install I have done. BTW i put it all together on the counter where i could get to it and hung the unit up as an assembly. Then wired it up.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Install was not too bad. Fan looks beautiful, and adds a modern look with out being to cheesy. We paired it with a switch box controller, and the fan settings to be controlled by either the box or the remote is nice.Furthermore, clicking different speeds is very responsive and appropriate speed for each setting. Some buffeting (normal for a 3 blade) and it is SUPER silent. Love it. We just bought a Harbor Breeze fan for a different room and we are returning because it is inferior in just about every way to this fan.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I installed this fan over a week ago and it works wonderfully. No, regardless what the manufacturer says, the fan blades are made of plastic. However, the look and function are awesome. I've probably sold a couple of these with friends seeing the fan and wanting one. The perfect fan for that special look in that particular room.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I love the combo of bronze, nickel and wood. Work great with my mix of antiques and traditional furniture pieces.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: looks great, fan wobbles on highest speed, tried the balancing weight in 15 different locations (5 on each blade) and everyone made it worse. took the light off and found the plate that mounts over the blades had flat spots on it, removed that and it still wobbled. Removed the blades and turned the motor on, the motor itself is whats causing the wobble, called Kichler and they will replace anything but the motor so I have to return it and wait for another fan. Other than this time consuming issue we really like the fan, the blades are plastic and obviously would prefer some kind of wood but you can't really tell unless you're handling it. Kichler's customer service is great, maybe I just got a lemon, if the next one does the same thing I'll definitely come back and give it 1 star, if the next one works great without having any wobble I'll come back and give it 5 stars. We'll see...

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Looks nice, it just doesn't move much air"
Review_Text: I would of liked to give a positive review. The fan looks nice, installation was pretty easy, instructions were good, the remote works well. Only thing is it does not move much air; even on the highest speed it is as if the blades were poorly designed. Only other complaint is the blades themselves look a little too much like the plastic they are.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Installation was painful and time consuming but the result was worth it. The fan looks great in our space, runs quiet and the light gives of a good amount of light which was important to us.

Product_Name: Kichler 54-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Don't buy this fan. These words are directly from the instructions, "An ON/OFF switch should always remain in the ON position, so as not to damage the fan's receiver." In other words, you can damage the device simply by turning it on an off. Wow. Kichler is either a) Incompetent: They can't design a device that works with a standard wall switch, or b) Conniving: They force you to buy their (very expensive) wall switch. One of those two things is true. Either way, I will not be buying any more Kichler products.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Matte White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Nice ceiling fan, but could be brighter"
Review_Text: We rally liked this fan. However, the light brightness is an issue. We have a rather high "A" frame ceiling. While the fan is genrally good, the high ceiling causes the lighting to travel too fair down to be effective for such things as reading, studing, etc. While I usndertand that that this would not likely be a problrem if we were maounting iit on a normal 8 ft. ceiling, I think that it would still be marginal in terms of brightness. Regardless, we do like tne gan will just adapt other lighting sources to make it work.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Aire Drop 52-in Matte White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: As easy a fan as any to install, great instructions.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The customer service at Lowe's was excellent and I appreciate the veterans discount rewards. The fan parts were appropriately labeled and the installation instructions were easy to read and follow. I was happy with the look and function when installed.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Simple but pretty. Went great with my beach decor.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great price and easy installation. Looks great in room as well

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Installation was a breeze, the quality of the fan really blew me away. After taking this bad boy for a spin anyone would be a fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought 4 of these fans to put in all of our bedrooms. We had our electrician install them. So far, they are working very nicely!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased 3 & they were easy to install. I have two suggestions - make the globe deeper to allow for standard size bulb, & make chains longer so they can be reached without a ladder. I really like that the pulls are clearly marked "light" & "fan".

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Put it up in our trailer and it works so well, it really gives a nice " breeze "..

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy to install and keeps room very cool. Ordered online & picked up @ store. Very convenient and fast. Customer service friendly.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I LOVE my new 52” Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fan that we recently bought and put up in our kitchen. It gives enough light and the fan is super quiet on all 3 speeds. The price of this fan made it affordable. Did I mention that I LOVE it? Lol.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fan-just right for our needs"
Review_Text: We were looking for an inexpensive alternative for a ceiling fan with light. The fan seems bigger than the box shows and has 5 fan blades instead of 4 so it works for our spare bedrooms!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We have purchased several of these to replace our outdated ceiling fans. Love the contemporary design.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Purchased this fan on sale at just under $40. It was the right size for my daughters bedroom and was easy to install. It's quiet and has been working great for the past two weeks.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan for the price. easy to install and quiet running....

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan at a fantastic price!EASY installation and more importantly super quiet.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: For as inexpensive as this fan/light is it is a great option, especially for anyone on a budget. I have installed 8 of these for different customers and have had no complaints, on the contrary nothing but compliments.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We love our Habor Breeze in our new sunroom. We spent most of our days out there.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Ceiling fan & light - good price, good product"
Review_Text: This is a nice looking ceiling fan & light. It is reasonably priced - I shopped around & felt satisfied with its value.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan was easy to put together and install as far as ceiling fans go. It operates quietly, has good air flow for average size room, and the LED light is brighter than the largest wattage allowed in ceiling light that it replaced. The only complaint I have is that the flush mount does not allow fan base to actually set flush to the ceiling as it has an 1/8 inch gap all around between base and ceiling.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "GREAT CEILING FAN FOR MY DAUGHTERS ROOM WHITE"
Review_Text: WOULD RECOMMEND IF THE GIRL ROOM IS PINK OR WHITE FURNITURE

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Excellent price very reasonable. Easy to install. LED light is the type with a regular screw base and not the small screw base. This is positive since can purchase a regular replacement LED light. Fan is very quiet at all speeds.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Great Fan at a very reasonable price"
Review_Text: I was looking for a replacement fan in a bedroom with a closed light fixture versus the open tulip flower style. I saw this fan which was on sale as a Contractor's special and put it up in the room. It is extremely quiet at all speeds and the LED light is just what we were looking to find. At less than $50 it is exactly what the doctor ordered!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This was one of the easiest installs to replace an existing fan

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan is one of the best values I have ever discovered. Loved the first one so much went back and bought two more.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased this on sale and got a great deal on it. I installed it myself and am currently sitting under it, on a hot summer day, writing this review. LOL It's quiet, has 3 speeds and the light is an LED. Supposedly this only uses $10 in electricity in a whole year...I can't promise that because I haven't had it that long and I think my other 3 old ceiling fans are eating up my bill. :) Overall, I love it and it looks GREAT in my dining room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought two of these to replace aging fans in a couple of bedrooms. The installation was easy and straight forward. The only quirky part as that you have to disassemble parts as packaged to retrieve screws (most fans have all the screws in a bag). The disappoint started when the sun went down and the ceiling fan became the primary light source. The single 600 lumens light left the room quite dim. The next day I bought a brighter LED bulb. HOWEVER... The light cover does not accommodate standard size (length) bulbs. You're limited to appliance size. Since the fans were already installed, it would have been a pain to take them down and return them. So... the fan is easy to install and works well. The low rating is due to the insufficient light and constraint on bulb options.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Only took 3.5 hours to install. Could not have been engineered to be more difficult (already was). I have never had so much trouble installing a ceiling fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan will not spin a faster speed at the highest setting. High speed feels like the lowest setting. Not pleased.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Looks good LED light bulb but fan shaft on the one I got was bent. Still works fine but if you look close you can tell it's bent. I should have returned it but after assembling did not want to go through the trouble. On a positive note the base is wide will cover any previous ceiling rings.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Armitage Builder Series 52-in White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought one of these in white and one in the brushed nickel color option. The Brushed Nickel fan is much better IMO. Assembly was much easier and it just doesn't feel quite as cheap. The white is a bit noisier as well. Still not a bad fan for the price, but unless you just want white I'd recommend going with the brushed nickel.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Classic 36-in White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This ceiling fan is small but throws a lot of light and cools a good area. It runs very quietly and was easy to install.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Classic 36-in White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Perfect size for a small area, blends with the ceiling

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Classic 36-in White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Put this fan in our master bath as we don't have a ceiling fan for moisture control when showering. Works great.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Classic 36-in White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Harbor Breeze 36-in White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan"
Review_Text: Harbor Breeze makes the BEST ceiling fans. I've always chosen them because of their styling, functionality and durability. I purchased this fan for a location where an extra 52-inch Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fan wouldn't fit because size constraints (proximity to wall). As all other Harbor Breeze Ceiling Fans I've purchased and installed, this one was literally a "breeze"! Simple assembly and installation combined with easy-to-follow instructions make it a snap to install. VERY highly recommended.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Classic 36-in White LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We purchased this fan to replace a larger one that was to big for the space it was in an. Once I installed the smaller fan it's been working very well.

Product_Name: Kichler Barrington 52-in Distressed Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great purchase so happy someone made fans that pair with lights!

Product_Name: Kichler Barrington 52-in Distressed Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan was fairly easy to install and looks fantastic!! Goes great with our craftsman style bedroom furniture. Seems to be high quality, provides great airflow and is quiet. I agree with other reviews in that the lighting is not very bright but that was not a deal breaker for us. It looks like a very high end fan.

Product_Name: Kichler Barrington 52-in Distressed Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I love the ceiling fan. Easy to install, runs quietly, matches light fixtures. The only thing I might change is the lightbulbs to make it brighter.

Product_Name: Kichler Barrington 52-in Distressed Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We are very happy with this fan. It runs quietly and looks amazing in our family room.

Product_Name: Kichler Barrington 52-in Distressed Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Cheap plastic remote does not attach to light switch and will break easily. The mounting bracket does not fit a standard ceiling fan hanger. Really cheap parts for the price.

Product_Name: Kichler Barrington 52-in Distressed Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We've owned the fan for just over a year. It looks fantastic and the air movement is decent. That is where the good ends. The light output is horrendous. Luckily for us, we had can lights installed in the bedroom as well. About two months ago, it started humming. Not the soothing constant hum of other fans, an annoying, loud inconsistent hum that prevents sleep instead of aiding it.

Product_Name: Kichler Barrington 52-in Distressed Black LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I REALLY like this fan. I'm a little confused why people rate it low because it works brilliantly with one exception: the remote. There is no on/off switch on the remote so its constantly juiced and because of that, the tiny A23 battery drains in about a month or less and thats with minimal use. Probably because its so focused on constantly lighting the little blue light in the base of the remote (which is too bright and will light up the room - i have to keep it in a drawer), but still. Battery dies WAY too often.Otherwise, the fan performs fantastic, there is no rocking of the unit while on max speed, personally I find the light to be somewhat low, but its still perfectly fine for my room. I wish there was a pullcord or something for when the battery dies, but otherwise, great fan. And it looks REALLY nice.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This is easy to install. The fan runs smoothly and quietly. All parts are well made. Hunter is quality.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Ordering and pick up was extremely easy.Assembly was quite easy and did not take long at all. We are quite pleased with theQuality and aesthetic look at the product

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Ordered this fan online and had it shipped to my house. It arrived in a few days. Took less than an hour to install. I have the fan and lights on seperate switches, very easy to wire up. It does work with dimmer switches for the lights, so I will change that out soon.Only negative to me is the fully encapsuled glass. If the bottoms were open it would look a little better.

Product_Name: Hunter Lincoln Edison Style LED 52-in Matte Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The only con with this fan is that it shakes just a little bit. I wonder if it's because of the jar. Maybe the weight. I'm not sure but other than that it's lovely.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: White fan, white ceiling, turn it on and it Disappears! Perfect look and amount of light for the bedroom. Very quiet.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan, quiet & beautiful & works great. Only complaint was that the battery was in the remote (per the instructions it shouldn't have been in there) & had corroded some so it wouldn't work & we had to replace it. I will be purchasing a larger version for my master bedroom.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased 2 of these fans. They are good looking, installed easily and are super quiet. In fact, there is no sound at all from them. Love that they adjustable for summer and winter and come with remote control. Highly recommend!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This low profile fan was a breeze to install. Light is bright enough for a small to medium size room. Installed bedrooms with 7'8” ceilings.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan is easy to install and Quit. The fan has a remote that controls the fan and light. The lighting is great, just need to remember that you the light is shipped dim. You will have to change the setting n hold the light remote button to brighten or dim the light. Enjoy the fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Instructions are poorly translated (tells you to remove battery from remote and then sync with fan -sorry thats not how electronics work) but fan design was simple enough to figure out on my own. Slight clicking sound on high setting but no where near as bad as my previous GE fan.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This is a nice, modern-looking, flush mount fan. Installation was ridiculously easy, partly because the instructions were accurate and clear (when was the last time you were able to say that?). The only thing holding me back from 5 stars is that I wish the remote had a screen like my other fan has, so I know whether the light is at 100% brightness, instead of just trying to let go of the button when I think it's at its peak. But that's really nitpicky! It's very quiet, and the white makes it almost disappear into the ceiling.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sailstream 44-in Gloss White LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "If you need LIGHT, this is not for you...."
Review_Text: I bought this fan for my very small kitchen after reading numerous reviews. I had high hopes because one review said it was dim at first and then it got brighter. But I have not been able to make it go bright! It is still very dim and actually hurts my eyes and does not provide any light for my kitchen. The bummer is that there is no way to replace the light casing with one that goes brighter, so now I have to spend additional money to add recessed lights and under counter lights.....I am so disappointed.....So beware.....The fan is beautiful and very quiet and efficient, but the light is not what I needed or expected.......

Product_Name: Hunter Lantern Bay LED 54-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: After reading the reviews, we decided to get this fan to replace an old one on our patio. My husband took his time and took the old one down and put this one up in a little over an hour. The high speed keeps our patio cool, even in July in Florida. It works great, and the light is brighter than we thought it would be after reading some of the reviews. It's more than enough light for our small patio. I like not having chains hanging from it, since the light is lower than our old one. I like having the remote also. So convenient. Hint: To put the battery in the remote, you have to remove the back with a small screwdriver. There's a place to slide the battery in. Easy enough, but we were trying to slide it apart.

Product_Name: Hunter Lantern Bay LED 54-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: We just bought this fan for our new screened in porch and we love it. It is very modern looking and goes great with the patio furniture we just bought as well. I love the ash grey color of the blades, the light is perfect and when you want to just relax in the evening there is a dimming feature that we use all the time. I would highly recommend this fan!

Product_Name: Hunter Lantern Bay LED 54-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Attractive, quiet, dimmable light feature. Everything we wanted

Product_Name: Hunter Lantern Bay LED 54-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought this fan because I read other reviews where it is very highly rated. However, it did not match my decor and I will be returning it unopened.

Product_Name: Hunter Lantern Bay LED 54-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Love it! Looks great under my patio cover. Comes with remote and works perfectly.

Product_Name: Hunter Lantern Bay LED 54-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Purchased two of these fans for my front porch. The look of the fans are very elegant. But I have noticed several issues: one fan rotates noticeably faster than the other at every speed level, lights will not dim, horrible airflow even at the highest setting, fan and lights have to operated by remote (very cheap feature in my opinion). Considering taking back down and returning.

Product_Name: Hunter Lantern Bay LED 54-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Very detailed instructions and very easy to install. Have hung plenty of fans and typically needed to make a hook to hang while wiring. This fan comes with a horseshoe bracket that allows the fan to be supported while wiring. Remote control is awesome.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Fan works great but remote control (transmitter) signal has problems communicating with receiver.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Hardly any air circulates, bought a rod to bring down closer, that helped. Have to use high since that's the only speed to feel anything. Don't know if wiring in house or fan, at times it just shuts off.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Heating; moves too much air even on speed 1, so not very good for down draft in the winter.Cooling: Speed 1 is fine, whirring noise on speed 2, clicking noise on speeds 3, 4, 5, and 6. Tried to use weights but with 9 blades it's impossible to figure out where the clicking is coming from or how to eliminate it.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: this is really a big donkey fan that moves a lot of air. i would have liked to have had separate connections for fan and light since i have two switches on the wall, but that is a minor issue

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I'm very satisfied with purchasing this 72 inch ceiling fan. I had a chandelier that was dated and I needed to find something to replace it. I have a lot of open space, along with high ceilings, so air circulation was a key concern for me. Once installed, this fan does what I need it to do and the remote works flawlessly from a long distance for me. The light is dimmable, so being able to adjust the moment is great. I enjoy being in this area of my house now. I just need two more of these in my house and I'll be completely satisfied. Great job Fanimation!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great for our large open plan family room! It was simple to install and looks beautiful!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Beautifully crafted for the price; nice, long paddles!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Barely audible, bright light, easy installation, moves a ton of air, and the remote works great out of the box. I have two of these in my 12 foot by 40 foot great room. These fans make a huge positive difference in keeping air flowing nicely throughout. The lights are nice and bright too - much more so than the old lights we had hanging in there.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We recently bought our third copy of this fan. We have each color and love them all. It's a great design, looks good stopped or moving. The motor is dead quiet and the remote gives plenty of speed and control options.I'd like the light to be a slightly warmer color, but this fan is a great value!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Purchased this fan in Arizona and we decided to move back to WA. This was one of the first things we purchased for our new house again! It's beautiful and and works great ! So many compliments on it!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Got this fan for our great room, it is perfect. Great size, color and operation. All handled by a remote.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: LOVE this fan! It is pretty, well made, and moves and the air. The fan was easy to put together, although it did take time. We have a very high ceiling, so it was more difficult. I love the remote and the six speeds for the fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Modern, powerful and quiet

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Perfect for a industrial yet sophisticated look"
Review_Text: Quiet smooth and a great scale.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan lots of air movement, needs a big room with a relatively high ceiling to look good.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "EZ to install works very well, moves air quietly.."
Review_Text: I am 72 and had no issues at all. Took my time through out the process. It does take a bit longer than many other ceiling fans as you have nine blades to install and attach. The syncing with power & light was also quite ez. I( would recommend this fan to anyone who has some basic experience wiring & working on ladders.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Very simple to install

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great looking, well made outdoor fan. No noise and great air movement. Awesome addition to our industrial/farmhouse mix covered patio. Photos to follow!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Love this fan, moves cubic feet of air around 5,500 cf per minute. Another great feature is it's a DC, direct current which saves power. Highly recommend this fan...

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Look great and moves a ton of air. Highly recommend

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought two of these for my outdoor patio and the work and look great.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We love this fan, it does cools our large living room plus looks awesome

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We bought 2 of these for our barn, that is deck out for nice parties!!We put white steel on the ceiling, added LED lights and these ceiling fans really brought it all together beautifully!!!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I purchased 2 of these for my lanai last week. We previously placed one in our bedroom 6 years ago and there is no fan that compares so when I saw that these were indoor/outdoor I replaced the two fans on my lanai with these. They are perfect! Quiet, efficient, stable, easy to mount (I did it myself) and easy to program. I love them and the neighbors love them as well. You cannot go wrong with these fans!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We just installed this fan in our great room and it works like a charm! The remote was easy to understand. In just a few days, we've gotten several compliments about the look. It was a great deal.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Excellent product! Originally bought a Hunter fan of similar size but there was a mismatch of blades (6) and blade mount plate (5) so we returned the Hunter. The Slinger provides great air circulation without a heavy breeze. I like the modern look.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: My fam room faces south & it hot as Hades during the day. The puny builder cheapie fan was replaced. It's great in gray & brushed nickel , fits a contemporary room. Hardware seems sturdy, 9 curved fan blades, remote, lite kit. I'm thrilled.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Ceiling fan looks great on our covered patio, having the remote makes it very easy to use.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Purchased this fan for family room, looks great , several different settings with dimable light. Well worth the money. Always get complements.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Very easy install, looks great in my outdoor area.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We only installed the fan today, so our impression is still quite fresh, buy wow! We love it!Super stylish. Statement piece. Easy to install. Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Excellent Fan! Exactly what I was looking for!"
Review_Text: I have standard 8 ft ceilings and was looking for a ceiling fan for my living room and master bedroom. Orignally I bought two 52” Hunter fans for both rooms, however, after installing the fans, I immediately noticed that I had very low airflow at the highest speed setting. I figured the fans were too small for the rooms so I removed the fans and exchanged them for two 60” Hunter fans only to be disappointed again that the airflow was very low at the highest speed. After researching as to why this was happening, I learned that the distance between the ceiling and fan blades greatly affect the airflow. Since I don't have high ceilings, I didn't have the option to go with a rod longer than 6-inches. So instead, I went with this 72” Fanimation Slinger fan, figuring that the 6 speeds and longer blades will compensate for the limited space between the ceiling and fan blades. First off, I took the advice of one of the other reviewers and searched for “fanimation slinger v2 installation” on Youtube to get an idea what the installation of this fan was going to look like. If you buy this fan, please watch this video as it will make your life easier! The video was spot on and made installation a breeze. Took me 30 mins to install each fan. Keep in mind this fan will NOT work correctly with a wall dimmer (it states this in the instructions so you will need a rocker wall switch instead of a dimmer). Also, the fan and LED light only powers on/off and changes speed with the included remote as there is no pull switch for the fan or LED light. And when programming the remote, you must follow the instructions EXACTLY to pair the remote to the fan. Make sure to read this step before you turn the power back on. After installation, I was able to pair the remote with no issues and tested the LED light. The light came on right away and dims by pressing and holding the light button on the remote. The light is very bright and the dimmer function is great. Then, the moment of truth...I turned on the fan. I pressed the remote and checked each speed from 1 through 6. Speed 3 on this fan was similar to the airflow I was gettting at speed 3 on the Hunter fans so I was encouraged since I still had another 3 speeds to go. At speed 4, I started to feel and hear the wind as the fan started to increase speed and by speed 6, I was able to feel the airflow from every corner of the room! Needless to say, I became relieved as I didn't want to uninstall and return another fan but I was also very happy to finally get great airflow from my new ceiling fans. Now, I must say that considering I have to run the fan at the highest speed for most of the day to be comfortable on a hot day, it is obvious that using the included 6-inch rod is still somewhat limiting the actual airflow I should be getting from a 72-in fan. But, it is still better airflow than what I was getting from a 3-speed 52-in and 60-in fan. For those with high ceilings, definitely go with a 12-inch or longer rod to install the fan in order to get the maximum airflow this fan can put out. I've read some reviews where some people couldn't even use speed 6 because the airflow was so strong. Overall, I am very happy with this fan and would definitely recommend it for those looking for great style, easy Installation and great features on a ceiling fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great value for the price. Modern technology and design

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: This is advertised as a 10,000 cfm fan when in reality it does not come anywhere close to that. Air movement and top fan speed is minimal. The 6 fan speeds are a total gimmick. It is extremely hard to notice the difference between different fan speeds. Technical support from fanimation turned out to be another disappointment, as they do not seem interested in providing any help with anything.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Burned out in less than a year..."
Review_Text: I purchased this fan on August 20, 2017. Love it but after the first month, I had issues with the fan. I would turn it on via remote and the fan would intermittently turn on and off a few times and then simply shut off. I would have to start the fan again several times before it finally turned on and stayed on. I called Fanimation and was told it's normal for "calibration" purposes. Less than a year later, the fan just stopped and I smelt the motor burning. Needless to say, the fan is beautiful and definitely an air mover when it works but I recommend if you buy this fan, you buy the warranty replacement plan with it from Lowe's. It's Friday evening on a FL summer and I can't get in touch with the manufacturer because they have limited business hours. I don't recommend this product and will not buy again.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: We had this fan hung but the remote will. It sync with fan. Customer service is nonexistent. I have emailed them but they will not respond. It is a disappointment paying so much for a fan and the remote and fan do not come preset to each other.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Obviously the blades would not be metal because of the weight but this fan looked completely different in store. The blades had a brushed nickel finish, we bought several of these for our new home and finally got them up and the blades are a creamy green tinged beige. Looks completely different than even the front of the box. Really disappointed because it is beautiful fan!just doesn't looked finished the blades looked primed and never painted. Should of made the blades match. The fan works great, but will be having someone take it back down and take it back. Had a specific look I don't want a beige fan especially for $300.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: First one I bought had to returned it quit working so hoping the second one works longer wish that I had paid lowes to install the first one so I did on the second one love the look

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I give it 5 stars for looks and air circulation - but 0 stars for motor (avg 3 stars). The remote sensor doesn't work all to well - called animation and provided new remote and "plug and play" sensor. inserted worked great for three weeks, then same issue. purchase wall mount remote which works better, but not great. Will not purchase again - unless they build in fail safe pull string!

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Answer some questions about two wall switches etc."
Review_Text: I have two wall switches and wanted to keep this, however the fan only comes with the wiring for one switch. This means I have to find the dumb remote to turn not the light, or mount the ugly remote to the wall. This wasn't an option.I can confirm that you CAN wire this to work with two wall switches. To do this, simply cut the plug off of the included lighting fixture and extend those two wires thru the center shaft. Connect this to your home wiring and blammo! You got lights on a wall switch. Now doing this will mean you cannot adjust the lighting using the remote since it is now wired directly. I can also confirm that you can wire THE LIGHT ONLY to a dimmer switch and it dims quite well. I use apple kit light switches, one dimmer to control the light, and another that turns the fan on and off. To control speed and direction of the fan we use the remote.Finally, a few notes about the fan. I find it extremely quiet. There is no motor noise at any speed, just air noise. In my installation however, it moves a very small amount of air. I believe this is cause by being at the top center of my cathedral ceilings. The tips of the blades get as close as about 3 inches from the ceiling. I believe this is causing some sort of cavitation, where there is not enough air from above to supply the air to blow down. Speed 6 blowing down yields almost an amount that cannot be felt. Running in reverse and we can feel the air being sucked up. I think for best operation, this should have 12 inches of clearance above the entire fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: Great fan! Just keep in mind 72" is a big fan! It was perfect for the space we were using it for. Good value for the look.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sail Stream 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: The Sailstream Ceiling Fan is just plain beautiful. It looks great in our bedroom, it keeps our room a lot colder, I love the fact that it mounts flush against the ceiling and I would most definitely recommend you get one. The installation was a breeze, almost everything you need is included in the box; you may have to buy a ceiling fan box, which is fairly inexpensive, mine was $15 with tax. If you have to start from scratch, meaning you don't have to make the hole on your ceiling and run wire to the ceiling fan, obviously the time needed to install the ceiling fan will take longer. I only had to cut a larger hole from the previous exciting light fixture in our room, and run their wires into the new ceiling fan, all in all, took about 45 min, but I also have plaster ceilings, so the cutting took a lot longer. Before buying one, or any type of ceiling fan for that matter, make sure you buy the correct type for your ceiling; if you have slopped ceilings, the Sailstream Ceiling Fan will not work for you.

This fan is easy to install, and instantly brings the look of the room into this century. Fairly standard ceiling fan performance for airflow and light - nothing notably better or worse than most. Remote works great! Looks a million times better than the junk that was hanging from my ceiling for the last 20+ years.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sail Stream 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Overall I can not recommend this fan. I actually purchased 3 for my boys rooms and paid to have all 3 installed. I was happy with the style as we are updating our home to more modern colors and fixtures. Unfortunately I immediately noticed one of the fans had an internal clicking sound like it was trying to switch modes(?). This happened constantly every minute or so, even after switching power off at the wall switch. Now a 2nd one does it, but not as frequent. The installer came by and could not isolate the issue and recommended I return it for another one. He took it down and was nice enough not to charge extra for that. The fan aspect is very nice, it moves air very well even with just 3 blades. However, the other MAIN issue I have with this fan, like many others, is the light. Another reviewer put it perfectly by saying it was more of a “mood light”. It is way too dim at full brightness to be the main lighting for a bedroom. I have decided to ‘eat' the cost of the installation and shop for new fans to replace them. Don't be like me, pay attention to the reviews and find what works best for you.
