Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Sail Stream 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: i have had to change 2 of these fans in the past 12 months. they look good, the remote makes it convinient. but if they break or stop working after only a few months, you're better off with the cheaper 50 dollar ones, that have not broken in any property i installed them in.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Works as designed, but don't like that your stuck with no options to change the color of light,if it fails you will have to change out a light module instead of a simple bulb.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED"
Review_Text: Nice looking fan and great price! I wish it had a pull chain on it because the remote control for the fan and light doesn't work very well. You need to aim the remote very close to the fan to get it to work and it doesn't work consistently.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Installed fan assy in kitchen (not recommended), illumination too low even at highest setting, light cover easy to put on but tight to unscrew when removing. Remote has more hesitation when dimming light assy. Blades produce shadow on ceiling because of design. Most light is projected downward and with low illumination not very bright where light is projected. Not recoommended for areas where you wish to have a lot of light for reading or doing things.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Installed the fan in a basement bedroom with a low ceiling. Perfect air flow for the space and it doesn't hang down into the room. Love the remote and LED light. There's just a little motor noise that's perfect as white noise. Can't find anything else with all the features for the price.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: really great quality for the price. Fan runs quietly and has pretty good lighting.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This a very attractive fan and the light is very bright. Also the install was effortless

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: It was our first time installing a ceiling fan. We found it easy to install. The fan has a nice finish to it, really has upgraded our room

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: This fan was easy to install, and works great!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: this fan hugs the ceiling nicely,is super quiet and and the remote switch to turn fan and light on is really convenient

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Two rooms had contractor installed fans and lights. They were very basic and we needed to upgrade. I had installed a couple of these at my sons house and was impressed with the style and quality. Installation takes no more than an hour at most. Very quiet, and no balancing needed. Highly recommended, and great price

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "Harbor breeze beach creek ceiling fan and light"
Review_Text: Great look for my kitchen with stainless appliances. Moves a lot of air and I really like the remote

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Looks great, love the option to hang the remote on the wall since I can't add a light switch. It is quiet, too.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I Like the modern styling. It puts out good bright light and a lot of air. I like the remote more than I thought I would. There were no issues installing it.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Has a modern sleek look and looks great in my small dining room.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Remote control & plenty of light with LED's. 3 blades provide lots of air on all 3 speeds. Priced right.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice fan looks good runs great, but the light is not as bright as I wanted. Yes it is dimmable, but even on the brightest its not good for a kitchen. The glass cover should be more transparent.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I like everything about it except the little hum noise. Good LED light and good variable speed fan with the remote. The room is only 156 sq ft, and the fan does a good job covering it.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: price at just over $100 this fan has both style and quality.easy to install but still takes two persons to put up.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Nothing special, but it works well and the remote control is nice.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Header: "It will snug mount but it's NOT easy"
Review_Text: We got this for out upstairs nursery that only has 8ft ceilings. I read all the reviews about this fan being a bear to closemount install and while it is true, it can be done. From the indtallation i found that cutting the excess wire out is absolutely neccessary. Also, the remote receiver box needs to be stuffed into the fan bracket with the stickers facing up. The edges are beveled a little and it doesnt look like it'd make a difference but it was the actually what finally allowed me to fully snug the fan up and get it screwed in. Oh yeah, don't even attempt this w/o a helper!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan has only 3 speeds and has a noticeable 60 Hertz hum. Might be tolerable but the fan makes a louder hum or buzzing sound as the built-in LED lights are dimmed. Noisy switching circuitry no doubt. As this fan goes over my desk, and I would like to use the built-in light at a lower lever than full on, it is not acceptable.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought 2 one worked. The second one had remote control problems. I called company and they took me through several steps to narrow down the problem. Sent me a new remote....the one you hold in your hand and operate fan. Reinstalled everything, did the learn procedure for the remote. Everything worked great. Tested the fan an light several time before family and grandkids showed up for holidays. What do you know! Fan and light won't work. Rechecked connections, flipped breaker and fan is turning on its own! Press the light button, light comes on and goes off. Fan won't turn and lights won't work. Plan to take BOTH FANS back to Lowes.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Beach Creek 44-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought this fan for my office/bedroom. I had my friend help me install it as he is an electrician. I wasn't able to see if the light was bright in the store because it was not lit at Lowe's when I looked at it but I assumed it would be bright since it's an LED. At first, the installation seemed easy until we realized that you have to actually take the fan motor assembly/light kit apart in order to slide the fan blades into the cover and attach them. You have to basically disassemble the main part of the fan in order to assemble it (attach the fan blades). My friend the electrician said this was the worst fan he has ever had to install! It was a P.I.T.A.! Then when it was all installed the light that it emits is a dull yellow, not bright white like I wanted. This is due to the glass cover, it dulls the LED's. It would have been much better if the glass was clear or not so yellow.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great looking and high quality fan with an easy installation

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It is great. I had always been afraid of putting a larger fan in my small living room, but my husband convinced me and I have not regretted it one bit. Moves air even at the lowest setting, quiet and the 4 bulbs light the space beautifully.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I bought this for my sons room. It was easy to install and doesnt make. Noise like some other cheap fans.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It was easy to install and the cone lights instead of the dome really brightens the room up and helps circulate the AC. It's very nice looking as well when you look at it.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Easy install, not the 1st I have done. Looks good in kitchen, blends with appliances.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Nice looking, very quiet and it was and easy install!

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Breeze through the install with a little common sense. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS! The directions are clear and very helpful. It took me about 30 minutes to put together and install. Works perfectly! Great product.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great quality! I would definitely recommend this fan to someone.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great price, quality product, easy installation. I would buy this product again

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Centreville 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Flush Mount Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Assembly was simple and installation was easy. The fan has great looks and the directions were clear and to the point. The fan is very quiet compared with the fan that it replaced. I also have 2 other Harbor Breeze products. Very good price also.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Notus 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Harbor Breeze “Notus” 52” Ceiling Fan – Brushed Nickel Finish The fan arrived with a slightly damaged box but the interior packaging protected all of the contents with no interior damage. My installation site is temporary so the pictures show open rafters above the fan. Installation was straight forward for a ceiling fan. Harbor Breeze used a nice bracket so that when you are ready to put the fan up overhead, it fits quickly and easily into the bracket. Wiring was very simple per instructions. This fan can be wired either for a single switch to power the whole unit or separate switches to power the lights and fan individually. Lighting included four 5.5 Watt LED light bulbs. The maximum allowable wattage is 6.5 Watts per socket allowing for brighter bubs if desired. Assembly was easy as per the instructions. Two assembly tips are as follows:1. A magnetized phillips head screwdriver would be very helpful in preventing dropped screws in tight areas. This also would save a lot of time on the floor looking for them!2. The bell cover over the motor includes a rubber grommet. This is required to be slid over the downrod. Twice I had the grommet come off and that required reversing assembly steps to put it back together again. Finally, I put a small drop of liquid dish soap and some water on the tip of my finger and lubricated the grommet. This made it slide easily on the downrod and facilitated assembly. After assembly and installation, I found the fan to be extremely quiet in all three speeds. I was surprised that there was no “blade balancing kit” included. The fan showed no wobbling in low and medium speeds and minimal wobbling at high speed so it may not be necessary to further balance the blades. All four lights come on with the pull of the chain. There is no provision for only half of them to come on. There is no remote control on this fan but I understand that one could be added from a remote control add-on kit available at Lowe's. The brushed nickel finish and darker sides of the blades are exactly what I was looking for. This will look awesome in the final installation site. This is a very nice fan and worth the full price.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Notus 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Great price for a great fan. Easy to install and looks great in our living room. Very happy with our purchase.

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Notus 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Header: "Notus 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan"
Review_Text: The Notus 52 inch fan is a beautiful addition to your home it brings beauty and the air movement to keep the room comfortable and great lighting . Use it summer and winter with it's multiple direction and speed control. Everyone would benefit from having one in your house and rooms. I recommend this product to anyone

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Notus 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Installed this in the main living room replacing an old fan with regular lighting. Installation was basic , this has three speeds that are reversible the highest speed is really strong for a big room it works fine . The led lights are a lot better then last fan, it came perfectly balanced when it was turned on but it can be balanced if needed with parts supplied

Product_Name: Harbor Breeze Notus 52-in Brushed Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Just finished installing my ceiling fan. The installation went smooth however there were two of the keepers that hold the bulb shades in place that were in need of filing. The aluminum in the threaded area would not allow the screw on piece to properly thread. Some filing was required to get the threads to match up with the porcelain lamp holder. One of the 3 screws that hold the lamp holder to the fan base is very difficult to install. The reason is that the screw hole is directly above the reversal switch. The fan does run well and did not need any extensive balancing procedures.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Very nice fan - quiet with lots of airflow, and gives off a lot of light!

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Very easy to install. The fan looks very nice in brushed nickel!

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Beautiful fan and so quiet you can't even tell it's running.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Hunter has great attention to details, like rubber dampeners the screws go through in the blades and extremely long wires to work through extended down rods. Only a small premium over knockoffs like Hampton Bay, and worth every penny.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This Hunter fan replaced our Harbor breeze fan in our living room. Installation was very straight forward, and operation is whisper quite, while still moving an adequate amount of air. Excellent quality at a very reasonable price. We will be buying Hunter fans from now on.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: The Hunter fan was better than I expected when I purchased it. At the store, this fan had everything I was looking for. The price was very reasonable and installation was easy. When I turned the fan on, it was so quiet that if the blades weren't moving I would not have known it was on! The lights were excellent brightness, even better than expected. There is one drawback in the chain length of the light being shorter than the fan chain. When I try to turn the light on, I grab the longest chain and end up turning the fan off. Overall, I highly recommend this fan and would buy this model when I need to replace another ceiling fan!

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This hunter ceiling fan works great, quiet, and best of all the install was easy and well thought out. I bought Another brand (Initials H B) days before this that i took back because install was absolutely awful and it wobbled and made noise. I they would have sent me a leveling kit but after the bad install design and immediate issues i just returned it and got this one. This hunter didn't need a balancing kit but it is included. So far I feel like this is a quality fan. Nice and quiet.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Placed the fan in the master bedroom. Changed the blades to grey to go with the Sherwin Williams Agreeable gray painted walls. It looks great and is a really quiet running fan . Looks beautiful and was purchased at a great price.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: For over 15 years I have always installed Hunter Fans in my homes! Being in the service has me transferring often. With each transfer I would purchase a home rather than rent. Each of my homes I would shop at Lowes for all my needs especially new ceiling fans! The looks are sleek and beautiful and most importantly no noise!

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Nickel LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Very easy installation. Less than 30 minutes from start to finish. Looks great.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection All-Weather Pylon 48-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (3-Blade)
Review_Text: Bought this for the master bedroom. Directions are great and easy to follow. Went in quickly. Love it.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: Hit the Jackpot in Ceiling Fans... Took like 1.5 hrs to install. And we're thrilled with results. It's silent, and gives lots of aiR. The light color of Blades makes it look Modern. Which is what i was looking for. I got tired of the dark Browns. We did have to ADD an extended Rod though (12inches) cuz we have the sink in ceiling in bedroom (or whatever you call it, Sorry). Totally worth the $100

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This Hubter Creekside fan does not disappoint. One can assemble a fan that can look very sophisticated with a grey fan blade as or decide on a casual vibe when the blades are inverted to a warm wood tone. Just a right amount of light is cast as well. This silent beauty offered at below 100.00 is a must for your home or office.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: If it makes my wife happy you can be sure it is good!

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This Hunter ceiling fan replaced an old 30 year original ceiling fan. I didn't realize how dated it was until it was replaced with this new stylish one. It sure made a difference. It was very easy for my nephew to install.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: This is so much better than the other junk Lowe's sell, higher quality, quieter etc.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: First fan I ever purchased was a Hunter and I'll keep buying the same. Fan is quiet and smooth , no balancing to do. Pricing was equal to other manufacturers.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: I am very pleased with my new Hunter Creekside indoor ceiling fan in my Florida room. The bronze color goes so well with the beams which are dark brown. It is very quiet.

Product_Name: Hunter Creekside LED 52-in Satin Bronze LED Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit (5-Blade)
Review_Text: It takes 2 to install. It's a little difficult to install. Take your time and read the directions. The look is exactly what we wanted.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: Took a little longer for installation than recommend installed this in my husbands office We love the look and being a small room with 10 ft ceilings looks perfect size 11.4 X 11.4 rm size two blades are very nice

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: The blades are hollow and plastic/fiberglass but you can not tell once it is installed and this is for weight. It does not move a ton of air on low but it does on high. It work very well for our bedroom but I can see if people may not want this kind of fan. I love it though.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan is pretty straightforward as far as install goes. Took me about 50 minutes total. The remote to the fan might literally be the ugliest thing I've ever seen. The fact that kichler would want you to mount it on the wall is laughable. Trust me, keep it in a drawer until you need it. Kichler is know for such great products and higher standards I'm just amazed the remote was made by them. I had a lutron caseta dimmer on that switch and it doesn't work with this fan. It makes a loud noise. So, I put a lutron caseta off/on switch and connected it to Alexa and it works perfectly. It's super super quiet! It moves a good amount of air considering it's only two fan blades. If you're looking to move more air you can turn it on high. It'll move a lot. Just not as much as a regular 5 blade fan. If you're looking for maximum air movement, this fan isn't for you. If you want a amazing looking fan and decent air movement then this is for you. The fan blades are made of plastic, but once it's hung up you can't tell at all. It looks amazing. Hope this helps.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: So love the look and function of this fan. Everyone who sees it comment about it. I know this is a crazy comment but i was shocked that it was plastic blades. They actually look like wood at a glance... most people think it is. 3 settings. 1 is almost too low, 2 is great and 3 is like a plane taking off, really pushes the air.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: Wanted something different and unique. Saw this and had to have it, it looks great and works very well.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: The fan looks great and it works as expected. I did have difficulty installing it. The blades are a mother... to install with the motor on the ceiling. I think is best to put the blades on before installing the motor. Aligning the blades with the small holes on the ceiling is very hard and frustrating. Other than that great product.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: We will be returning these. We bought two for our attic and when standing underneath them you could barely feel any air moving. Looked great but what's the point if it doesn't do the job? Remote is kind of cheap looking too. Installation was tricky as it took some time to get one of the remotes to connect to the receiver - a good chunk of a day wasted putting them up :(

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: This is a really neat fan, that resembles an airboat prop. I would have given it 5 stars if it had a light! :)

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: Great product. Nice look even if the blades are plastic. Easy to install.Recommended.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: Does not move air. Blades are plastic, not woos. And comes with a short rod only. The picture is misleading as it shows it with a longer rod which you have to purchase separately. Over all would not recommend.

Product_Name: Kichler 56-in Satin Black Indoor Ceiling Fan and Remote (2-Blade)
Review_Text: I like the design but with only two blades the problem is balancing. It does come with a balance kit so Kichler does try to keep the customer satisfied. Im still having issues of it being out of balance on max speed so i just leave it to medium. It looks great but also remember that with two blades it tends to chop thr wind more so it does get some wind noise.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Header: "Great Looking Fan but over priced for quality."
Review_Text: The fan looks great once we put it up. But initially after unboxing it and pulling out the fan blades I expected them to be better quality. Also the highest setting 6 we expected it to be very strong... We joked that it would blow everything off the walls, however the Highest setting was not as powerful as we expected. Overall we really like the look of the fan.

Product_Name: Fanimation Studio Collection Slinger v2 72-in Matte Black LED Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light Kit and Remote (9-Blade)
Review_Text: I own a fan like this. I haven't used it past the 4th setting as it is pretty strong. Will be adding two more to anew home we're building.
